tasks.text: From the start head right at the first turn and pick up the [Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse)
Loot the corpse on the fountain to obtain the [Ashen Estus Flask](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ashen+Estus+Flask)

Turn right after the fountain and head down the path through a flooded passage. Kill the [Ravenous Crystal Lizard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ravenous+Crystal+Lizard) to get a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) and then pick up the [Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler) from the corpse in the area
The [Speckled Stoneplate Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Speckled+Stoneplate+Ring) is also in this area
Head back to the fountain and take the path straight ahead. Climb the cliff and rest at the Cemetery of Ash bonfire to receive the Rest gesture
From the bonfire head down the left path and jump from the cliff over to the corpse on the tomb to pick up a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard)
Take the side ridge down from the large cliff face on the right to pick up [Firebomb x5](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Firebomb) from a nearby corpse

Back on the main path head through the archway and take the sword embedded in the statue. Kill [Iudex Gundyr](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Iudex+Gundyr) to receive the [Coiled Sword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Coiled+Sword)
Congratulate yourself on beating the first boss of Dark Souls 3 and rest at the [Iudex Gundyr](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Iudex+Gundyr) bonfire
Continue through the large door and pick up the [Broken Straight Sword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Broken+Straight+Sword) from the corpse leaning on the tombstone
The [Wolf Ring+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Wolf+Ring) is behind the door you just passed
Head over to the large cliff edge and pick up the [Homeward Bone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone) at the edge of the ridge

Take the left path up the cliff and turn left just before [Firelink Shrine](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Firelink+Shrine) and grab the [East-West Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/East-West+Shield) from the corpse on the tree

Kill [Sword Master Saber](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sword+Master) to get [Uchigatana](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Uchigatana) + [Master's Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Master's+Set) and to unlock his summon sign

Head back and up the path to the left to pick up an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) from a corpse above the entrance above [Firelink Shrine](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Firelink+Shrine)

Continue across to the other side picking up a [Homeward Bone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone) from a corpse behind a tomb and another [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) from the lower ridge
Go back to the main path and enter [Firelink Shrine](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Firelink+Shrine)
Talk to [Fire Keeper](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fire+Keeper)
Talk to [Shrine Handmaid](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shrine+Handmaid)
Talk to [Hawkwood](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hawkwood) to receive the Collapse gesture
Talk to [Blacksmith Andre](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blacksmith+Andre) to receive the Hurrah! gesture

Go out the top of [Firelink Shrine](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Firelink+Shrine) and pick up the [Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse) from the corpse next to the small decrepit tower
When you have the [Tower Key](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Tower+Key), unlock the small decrepit tower and head up to the bridge leading to the Bell Tower
Roll off the bridge onto the [Firelink Shrine](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Firelink+Shrine) roof and kick down the ladder shortcut
Just behind the roof kill the [Crystal Lizard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Lizard) to get a [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)
Pick up [Homeward Bone x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone) from the lower part of the roof
Inside the roof pick up the [Estus Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Shard) from up in the rafters

Trade a [Homeward Bone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone) with [Pickle-Pee, Pump-a-Rum](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pickle+Pee,+Pump-a-Rum+Crow) crow to receive the Call Over gesture and the [Iron Bracelets](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Iron+Bracelets). For the other trade options see the Misc page

Hit the [illusory wall](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Illusory+Walls) at the back of the rafters and drop down to get the [Covetous Silver Serpent Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Covetous+Silver+Serpent+Ring) from the chest
Head into the Bell Tower, go up the lift and [Patches](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Unbreakable+Patches) may close the door depending on your progress in the game
At the top of the Bell Tower, pick up the [Fire Keeper Soul](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fire%20Keeper+Soul)
Go back down the lift and look down the right side. Carefully jump down to the tombstone and pick up the [Fire Keeper Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fire+Keeper+Set) from the corpse
Make your way down to the bottom and pick up the [Estus Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Ring) from another corpse and open the door
Open the door ahead and rest at the High Wall of Lothric bonfire

Take the right path onto the rampart and head down the small stairs on the left. Pick up the [Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse) from the corpse

Head back up the stairs and up the next set of stairs at the end of the rampart. If you want [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) + [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember), wait for one of the undead to transform into [Pus of Man](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pus+of+Man) and then kill it. Also, pick up [Longbow](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Longbow) + [Standard Arrow x12](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Standard+Arrow) from the corpse
Go back to the bonfire and this time head down the left path. Pick up the [Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse) from the corpse
Head up the stairs at the end of the rampart and up some more stairs to the top of the turret. Pick up the [Binoculars](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Binoculars) from the corpse
Go back downstairs and drop down behind the dragon. Enter the small doorway to pick up [Gold Pine Resin x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Gold+Pine+Resin) from the corpse
Drop into the indoor room and pick up [Firebomb x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Firebomb) from the corpse beside the table
Go down the ladder and pick up the [Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse) from the corpse outside of the cell
Snipe the dragon until it drops a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) and flies away

Grab the [Claymore](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Claymore), [Club](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Club), [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) and [Large Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse) from in front of where the dragon was

Open the door underneath where the dragon was. Go downstairs. Either kill the [Mimic](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Mimic) or hit it with an [Undead Hunter Charm](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Undead+Hunter+Charm) to get the [Deep Battle Axe](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Battle+Axe)
Head out the door on the other side and pick up the [Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse) from the corpse on the left
Go into the next building and pick up [Firebomb x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Firebomb) from the wooden beam
Go out the side exit and up the stairs and pick up the [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) from the corpse. Light the Tower on the Wall bonfire

After lighting the Tower on the Wall bonfire, return to [Firelink Shrine](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Firelink+Shrine) and talk to [Ringfinger Leonhard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Leonhard) who gives you [Cracked Red Eye Orb x5](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Cracked+Red+Eye+Orb). He'll be by Lothric's throne. If he isn't at this point, try killing Vordt and check again
Back inside the building go down the stairs, out the side door, and pick up a [Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse) from the corpse on the right

Head onto the roof. If you want [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) + [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember), wait for one of the undead to transform into [Pus of Man](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pus+of+Man) and then kill it. And pick up [Firebomb x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Firebomb) from the corpse. Continue on and kill the [Crystal Lizard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Lizard) to receive a [Raw Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Raw+Gem). There is another corpse on the roof which holds a [Large Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse)
The [Fleshbite Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fleshbite+Ring) is on another roof that can be jumped to
Take the ladder down and go onto the side roof to get [Black Firebomb x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Firebomb) from the corpse
On the adjacent balcony with the archers pick up [Firebomb x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Firebomb) from the corpse

Go back inside the earlier building next to the ladder. Take the immediate left and roll into the pots to get [Undead Hunter Charm x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Undead+Hunter+Charm) from the corpse. Continue inside and grab the [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) from the corpse while being cautious of the ambush
Back in the main room pick up the [Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse) from the corpse tucked inside the first corner
Continue through the doorway and take the next door on the left. Pick up the [Broadsword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Broadsword) from the corpse
Head down the stairs taking the right path and get the [Silver Eagle Kite Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Silver+Eagle+Kite+Shield) from the chest
Head back to the original entrance and find the doorway blocked by debris. Roll through it and pick up [Green Blossom x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Green+Blossom) at the end of the ledge
Drop down and pick up the [Astora Straight Sword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Astora+Straight+Sword) from the chest

Continue into the room and pick up the [Cell Key](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Cell+Key) and [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) from the corpses around the room
Grab an [Estus Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Shard) on the altar in the same room
The [Ring of the Evil Eye+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+the+Evil+Eye) is in the back of the room behind some barrels
Head out the lower level and drop down to pick up the [Rapier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rapier) next to the drain
On corpses around the fountain you can collect [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) and another [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)
Head out towards the courtyard and turn left to pick up the [Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse) from a corpse

Go upstairs right of the courtyard entrance and head straight along the path. After leaving the first door immediately turn left to find [Green Blossom x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Green+Blossom) on a corpse
Activate the elevator to open up a shortcut from the High Wall bonfire. Behind the elevator at the top is [Throwing Knife x6](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Throwing+Knife) on a corpse

Travel to the Tower on the Wall and proceed all the way down inside the tower. Go into the next room and pick up [Throwing Knife x8](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Throwing+Knife) on the corpse
Continue along the passageway and pick up the [Mail Breaker](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Mail+Breaker) opposite the door on a corpse

Further down in this area you will find a locked cell. With the [Cell Key](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Cell+Key) you can free [Greirat of the Undead Settlement](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Greirat+of+the+Undead+Settlement) and talk to him. If you agree to find Loretta, he gives you the [Blue Tearstone Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blue+Tearstone+Ring). He then moves to [Firelink Shrine](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Firelink+Shrine)

Travel to the High Wall of Lothric and take the elevator shortcut down. Head back towards the main courtyard but this time take the stairs to the left overlooking the fountain area. Grab the [Large Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse) on the rooftop
Jump onto the awning to pick up a [Ring of Sacrifice](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+Sacrifice)
Continue back to the courtyard. In the corner of the terrace just before the stairs leading down, you can summon [Lion Knight Albert](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lion+Knight+Albert)

Head to the left. Go up the stairs on the left just before the castle and kill the red-eyed [Lothric Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lothric+Knight) to get a [Refined Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Refined+Gem)

Inside the chapel talk to [Emma, High Priestess of Lothric Castle](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Emma) to receive the [Small Lothric Banner](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Small+Lothric+Banner). Talk to her again for the [Way of Blue](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Way+of+Blue) covenant
Heading out from the chapel take the left stairs and pick up the [Lucerne](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lucerne) from the corpse
Just before walking through the great gate, you can summon [Sword Master Saber](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sword+Master) if he was killed earlier at Firelink Shrine

Proceed through the gate and kill [Vordt of the Boreal Valley](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Vordt+of+the+Boreal+Valley); receive [Soul of Boreal Valley Vordt](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+Boreal+Valley+Vordt). After killing Vordt, raise the banner at the cliff to access the [Undead Settlement](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Undead+Settlement)
After the Bat Wing Demons have dropped you off, walk to the left and grab a [Large Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse)
Go downstairs. Walk behind an overturned carriage and kill two [Dogs](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dog) to get [Alluring Skull x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Alluring+Skull)

Find [Yoel of Londor](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Yoel+of+Londor) below the Foot of the High Wall bonfire amongst several other Pilgrims. Talk to him and agree to his request and he moves to Firelink Shrine. Head back to Firelink Shrine and talk to Yoel to receive the Beckon gesture. Accept Yoel's offer to Draw Out True Strength which gains you a free level and a [Dark Sigil](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dark+Sigil). From now on, for each time you die, you gain 1 Hollowing per Dark Sigil. Yoel offers 4 more free levels at 2, 6, 12, and 15 Hollowing, so getting all 5 Dark Sigils should not take long. If you do not get all 5 Dark Sigils before reaching the Catacombs of Carthus, Yoel dies which voids the Usurpation of Fire Ending

After you get all 5 Dark Sigils and refresh the world, Yoel dies with [Yuria of Londor](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Yuria+of+Londor) watching over his newfound corpse. Talk to her to receive the Dignified Bow gesture and buy the [Londor Braille Divine Tome](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Londor+Braille+Divine+Tome)
Near Yoel, you will find [Homeward Bone x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone) on the far left edge of the bridge
From the Undead Settlement bonfire, enter the house. Cut down a glowing hanging corpse to get the [Small Leather Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Small+Leather+Shield)

Walk downstairs to get [Charcoal Pine Bundle x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Charcoal+Pine+Bundle). Walk out onto the balcony and cut down the hanging body. Turn right around the corner to get [Repair Powder x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Repair+Powder)
Walk downstairs to get another [Charcoal Pine Bundle x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Charcoal+Pine+Bundle)
Go outside and grab [Loretta's Bone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Loretta's+Bone) from the body you cut down
Grab an [Estus Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Shard) by the burning tree with worshipping undead

On the other side of the tree, grab an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember). Shoot down a hanging corpse from the tree to get [Kukri x9](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Kukri). Walk to the closed gate to grab a [Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler)
Walk to the right of the house to grab a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard)

Walk through a large archway of the house, open a door, and walk into the room. Grab [Charcoal Pine Resin x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Charcoal+Pine+Resin) from a corpse near the wall. Cut down the bodies hanging over the staircase to get a [Large Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse). Drop down from a hole in the room. In this hidden room, discover the [Warrior of Sunlight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Warrior+of+Sunlight) covenant and consume [Estus Soup](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Soup)

Open the door and walk to the end of the hallway. You should now be on the main street of the neighborhood. Head right and break through the wooden crates between the first gap on your right. Grab a [Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler)
Walk back the main street and proceed. A wooden door should automatically break. Walk into that house to get the [Whip](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Whip)
Proceed back onto the main street. Walk until you see a wooden wheel to your right. Walk around the corner to get a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard)
Climb up the balcony with an [Evangelist](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Evangelist). Grab a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard)
Climb down from the balcony and walk onto a rooftop. Jump onto the wooden platform on your left to grab [Rusted Coin x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Coin)

Jump down to kill the [Crystal Lizard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Lizard) which drops a [Sharp Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sharp+Gem). Light the Dilapidated Bridge bonfire further below

Mad dark spirit [Holy Knight Hodrick](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Holy+Knight+Hodrick) will invade near the Dilapidated Bridge bonfire if you are embered. Kill him for his [Vertebra Shackle](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Vertebra+Shackle)

Get back to the burning tree near the beginning of Undead Settlement, walk across the bridge, and walk around the right which should be blocked by wooden crates and barrels. Walk towards the houses with the [Thralls](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Thrall). Find a [Fading Soul](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fading+Soul) here. Walk around one of the houses to get the [Plank Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Plank+Shield). Walk onto the rooftop of the house to your left and grab [Firebomb x6](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Firebomb)

Climb onto the rooftop of the other house and grab [Homeward Bone x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone). Jump down to where a non-hostile Cage Carrier is walking around. Cut down the hanging corpse at the end and grab the [Flame Stoneplate Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Flame+Stoneplate+Ring). (If the corpse falls down and you are unable get the item, just proceed to the next step)

Examine the Cage Carrier from behind. After you get out of your cage, walk towards the light. Grab the [Wargod Wooden Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Wargod+Wooden+Shield). Talk to [Holy Knight Hodrick](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Holy+Knight+Hodrick) to receive the [Mound-makers](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Mound-Maker) covenant and a [Homeward Bone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone). (If you have reached the Curse-rotted Greatwood before reaching the Cage Carrier, Hodrick dies and the Cage Carrier becomes hostile. Thus, you cannot acquire the covenant until later through Sirris' sidequest.) Quit and reload to reappear near the Cage Carrier. Retrieve the ring if you missed it before

Head back, dropping down a small ledge on the left. Enter the house near the bridge and pick up a [Large Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse). Then open the backdoor
From your right, get the [Caduceus Round Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Caduceus+Round+Shield)

Walk across the bridge towards the house in view and jump down to the ledge on your right. When you are on the ledge, walk towards the bridge to get a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard)
The other way leads you to the Cliff Underside bonfire under the house and to a way up

Walk to the top of the house and find a cage that houses [Cornyx of the Great Swamp](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Cornyx+of+the+Great+Swamp). Talk to him, and he moves to Firelink Shrine. At the Shrine, talk to him multiple times to receive your [Pyromancy Flame](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pyromancy+Flame) (unless you are already a pyromancer) and the Welcome gesture
Grab the [Hand Axe](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hand+Axe) and get a [Partizan](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Partizan) from a nearby hanging body

Walk down from the house and walk onto the gallow. Grab a [Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler). Walk across the unfinished bridge to get the [Fire Clutch Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fire+Clutch+Ring)

Walk through the archway of the house and down the stairs. Walk left and around the corner to get a [Large Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse). Walk downstairs and towards a tree with a [Dog](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dog). Kill it and get the [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)

Run towards the bridge, and enter the sewers on the right. Kill a Giant [Rat](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/rat) to get the [Bloodbite Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Bloodbite+Ring). Grab the [Caestus](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Caestus) and climb up to open the shortcut

Walk back through the sewers and onto the bridge to get another [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember). Walk upstairs towards the house on your right. Grab a [Large Soul of a Deserted Corpse](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Deserted+Corpse). Walk around the right side of the house to get [Alluring Skull x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Alluring+Skull)

Walk towards the tower. Talk to [Eygon of Carim](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Eygon+of+Carim) outside. If you have enough health, you can drop down into the valley to reach [Irina of Carim](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Irina+of+Carim) in her cell, but don't bother. You can reach Irina by purchasing the Grave Key from the Shrine Maiden after giving the maiden the [Mortician's Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Mortician's+Ashes) which is futher down in this list

Walk into the tower to find [Siegward of Catarina](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Siegward+of+Catarina). Get on the elevator which goes down to the basement. Kill the [Boreal Outrider Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Boreal+Outrider+Knight) to get the [Irithyll Straight Sword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Irithyll+Straight+Sword), grab the [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) and rest at the [Road of Sacrifices](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Road+of+Sacrifices) bonfire
The [Life Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Life+Ring) is behind Siegward on the upcoming balcony

To reach the top of the tower, hit the switch on the elevator while at the main entrance and then quickly get off to reveal a second lift. After getting off the lift you can find a [Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier) in a corner. At the top of the tower, offer a token of friendship to the [Giant of the Undead Settlement](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Giant+of+the+Undead+Settlement) so that he does not attack you with giant arrows and even assists you when you are next a White Birch. Take the lift down, and while facing the entrance of the tower, when you hear Siegward's voice, roll off to land onto a wooden platform. Head outside and speak to Siegward again. Lure the the Fire Demon towards the tower which makes Siegward come and fight by your side. After killing the Fire Demon you gain a [Fire Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fire+Gem). Speak to Siegward three times to receive a [Siegbräu](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Siegbrau), the Toast gesture, and the Sleep gesture

Around the town, you can grab a [Homeward Bone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone) and a [Large Club](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Club). You can also get the [Northern Armor Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Northern+Armor+Set) from a nearby hanging corpse

A [Pale Tongue](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pale+Tongue) can be found on a nearby hanging corpse. Obtaining the tongue here or from invading successfully leads to Leonhard returning to Firelink Shrine. He then gives you the [Lift Chamber Key](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lift+Chamber+Key) that opens the door below the Tower on the Wall bonfire of High Wall of Lothric. Kill the Darkwraith imprisoned there to get a [Red Eye Orb](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Red+Eye+Orb). Return to Firelink Shrine and talk to Leonhard to receive the Applause gesture

Walk into the house to get [Red Bug Pellet x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Red+Bug+Pellet). Walk upstairs and grab [Alluring Skull x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Alluring+Skull). Walk across a bridge and into a house. Pillage a chest to get [Human Pine Resin x4](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Human+Pine+Resin). Walk onto the roof and to the left to get [Flynn's Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Flynn's+Ring)
The [Covetous Silver Serpent Ring+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Covetous+Silver+Serpent+Ring) is on one of the lower rooftops

Drop down onto the ledge of a tower. Grab [Homeward Bone x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone). Drop down from within the tower to get the [Mirrah Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Mirrah+Set) without the mask and the [Chloranthy Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Chloranthy+Ring)

Warp back to the Dilapidated Bridge bonfire, enter the graveyard pierced by giant arrows, and walk towards the house on the left. Grab [Blue Wooden Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blue+Wooden+Shield) + [Cleric Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Cleric+Set) in front of the house and [Mortician's Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Mortician's+Ashes) by a tree to the left. If dodging the giant arrows is too troublesome, head to the tower to befriend the Giant
The [Poisonbite Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Poisonbite+Ring) is behind the well

Grab all the items around the White Birch (one of them being the [Reinforced Club](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Reinforced+Club)) including the [Undead Bone Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Undead+Bone+Shard) on the platform to the right of the White Birch
Enter the house and walk upstairs. Grab the [Great Scythe](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Great+Scythe). Continue to walk towards the stone building and open the doors on your right

Return to Firelink Shrine. Give [Loretta's bone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Loretta's+bone) to Greirat, who then allows you to keep the Blue Tearstone Ring. You can reload the area and talk to Greirat again to learn the Curl Up gesture. You can reload the area once more and send him to pillage Undead Settlement. He returns when you kill a boss

Give the Shrine Handmaid the [Mortician's Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Mortician's+Ashes) and then purchase the [Grave Key](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Grave+Key) which opens the locked door in the sewer area next to the Dilapidated Bridge bonfire

Go back the sewer area and open the locked door. Climb down and walk towards [Velka the Goddess of Sin's statue](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Velka+the+Goddess+of+Sin) to grab a [Loincloth](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Loincloth)

Proceed through the tunnel to get the [Red Hilted Halberd](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Red+Hilted+Halberd). Continue into another room to get a [Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler)

Walk outside to kill a [Crystal Lizard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Lizard) which drops a [Heavy Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Heavy+Gem). Grab the [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) and another [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard)
Walk through the archway tunnel. Shoot down a hanging corpse to get a [Blessed Red and White Shield+1](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Red+and+White+Shield)
Walk into a new room and climb down to get a [Saint's Talisman](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Saint's+Talisman)

Climb up and talk to [Irina of Carim](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Irina+of+Carim) to receive the Prayer gesture. Touch her and accept her services. She then moves to the Firelink Shrine. After recruiting Irina, make sure to go outside and speak to Eygon. At the shrine, you can give Irina the [Londor Braille Divine Tome](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Londor+Braille+Divine+Tome), but doing so and buying any of its spells leads to her Dark ending. Otherwise, hang onto it until you find Karla later in the game

Kill the [Curse-rotted Greatwood](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Curse-rotted+Greatwood) to get [Soul of the Rotted Greatwood](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+the+Rotted+Greatwood) + [Transposing Kiln](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Transposing+Kiln). Give the Transposing Kiln to [Ludleth of Courland](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ludleth+of+Courland) so he can turn boss souls into weapons, rings, and spells
Talk to Hawkwood after killing the Greatwood to receive a [Heavy Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Heavy+Gem). If he does not give you anything, come back to him after killing another boss
If you haven't done so before, you can send Greirat to pillage Undead Settlement. He returns when you kill a boss
Travel to the Road of Sacrifices bonfire. Head down the path and drop down to the left of the tree to find a [Shriving Stone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shriving+Stone)
A bit farther on you'll find a [Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler) next to an overturned wagon
The [Chloranthy Ring+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Chloranthy+Ring) is down on a ledge behind the first Corvian Storyteller

At the fork in the path, head left and drop off the path when it ends. Head left again (instead of going under the bridge) and kill the [Madwoman](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Madwoman) NPC for the [Butcher Knife](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Butcher+Knife)

Grab the [Brigand Axe](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Brigand+Axe), the [Brigand Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Brigand+Set), and the [Brigand Twindaggers](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Brigand+Twindaggers) from this lower area
Turn around and head back up the path and under the bridge. Head up and across the bridge for a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard)

Cross back over the bridge and head to the next bridge. Before crossing it, drop off to the right to reach an area where you'll find the [Braille Divine Tome of Carim](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Braille+Divine+Tome+of+Carim) and [Morne's Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Morne's+Ring). Give the tome to [Irina of Carim](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Irina+of+Carim) at Firelink Shrine and buy all the spells it offers if you want her to become a Fire Keeper later in the game
Before entering the archway that leads to the Halfway Fortress bonfire, you can find an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) on a ledge with a caster enemy

Talk to [Anri of Astora](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Anri+of+Astora) at the Halfway Fortress bonfire. Talk to [Horace the Hushed](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Horace+the+Hushed) to get the [Blue Sentinels](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blue+Sentinels) covenant. Make sure to deplete Anri's dialogue before continuing the game
After meeting Anri of Astora, return to Firelink Shrine to talk to [Sirris of the Sunless Realms](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sirris+of+the+Sunless+Realms) to begin her quest line

Head into the Crucifixion Woods from the Halfway Fortress bonfire. Drop off the right side of the path as soon as it turns left, and drop again to grab a [Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler)

Drop off again and head straight while hugging the wall to your right. You'll arrive at a door. Head in and straight across to a balcony-type area where you'll find some stairs leading to the [Sellsword Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sellsword+Set)
Drop down to find the [Sellsword Twinblades](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sellsword+Twinblades) directly underneath the corpse that had the Sellsword Set
A bit farther in the building you'll find the [Farron Coal](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Farron+Coal), which enables Heavy, Sharp, and Poison infusions

Head back outside through the same door you used to enter. Step into the water and follow the edge of the water to the left. Hug the cliffs and you'll find a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard)

Continue on with the cliff wall to your left. You'll head past the ramp that leads back up to the Halfway Fortress bonfire, but keep the cliff to your left after moving past it. You'll find another [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard)

Continuing in this manner, you'll find a large group of [Poisonhorn Bugs](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Poisonhorn+Bug) guarding yet another [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard)
At this point, deviate from the cliff wall for a bit and head up the hill towards the water for the [Twin Dragon Greatshield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twin+Dragon+Greatshield)

Head towards the stone wall with the large broken arch (which you would have eventually reached had you stuck to the cliff wall). Grab the [Fading Soul](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fading+Soul) from the corpse before heading through

Turn right soon after heading through the arch to reach the Crucifixion Woods bonfire. Walk along the rocky wall towards the ruins until you reach a purple summon sign for mad phantom [Holy Knight Hodrick](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Holy+Knight+Hodrick). When summoned, he instantly becomes hostile, so kill him for souls
Head past where Hodrick's summon sign was until you reach a ledge. Fall down to grab the [Estus Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Shard)
Continue around the building to a large bonfire with an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)
Finish your circuit around the building for a [Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler)

Back at the Crucifixion Woods bonfire, drop off into the water and kill the [Great Crab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Great+Crab) furthest away from you for the [Great Swamp Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Great+Swamp+Ring)

If you are embered, dark spirit [Yellowfinger Heysel](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Yellowfinger+Heysel) invades around where the two giant crabs are. Kill her for [Heysel Pick](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Heysel+Pick) + [Xanthous Crown](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Xanthous+Crown)

You will find the following items in the water: [Green Blossom x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Green+Blossom), [Green Blossom x4](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Green+Blossom), the [Grass Crest Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Grass+Crest+Shield), the [Conjurator Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Conjurator+Set), and the [Great Swamp Pyromancy Tome](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Great+Swamp+Pyromancy+Tome). The tome and the set are in the deep part of the swamp near the entrance of [Farron Keep](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Farron+Keep)

In the water near where you jump down from the Crucifixion Woods bonfire (near where the two Green Blossoms were), there are steps leading out of the water and a door to the left of them. Head through the door to find a small area with the [Sage Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sage+Ring) and the [Sorcerer Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sorcerer+Set)
The [Lingering Dragoncrest Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lingering+Dragoncrest+Ring) is next to a tree

Head back out of this small area and take the steps to your left. Enter the building and proceed to the next room ahead to find a hallway with a [Crystal Lizard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Lizard), which will drop a [Crystal Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Gem) when killed

Go back to the previous room and head up the steps all the way to a balcony. Drop off the broken end to reach a ledge with a [Ring of Sacrifice](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+Sacrifice)

Drop down, head back up the steps to the same room you were just in, and head up the stairs in the room, but only until you reach the broken wall. Head through down the path to grab the [Golden Falcon Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Golden+Falcon+Shield)
Drop down from here and kill the two NPCs for the [Great Club](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Great+Club) and the [Exile Greatsword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Exile+Greatsword)

Near the water's edge is a corpse with the [Fallen Knight Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fallen+Knight+Set). There is also a [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler) by the wall

Head into the building the NPCs were guarding. There is [Homeward Bone x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone) on a balcony in here. Double back and head down the ladder to light the Farron Keep bonfire

Warp or run back to the Crucifixion Woods bonfire. Head into the ruins this time (the ones you previously traveled around before to grab the Estus Shard). The entrance is a hole in the wall in a small depression in the ground. In the first room you'll find the [Heretic's Staff](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Heretic's+Staff) in an alcove to the right

Continue on until you reach a 4-way crossroads and then go through the door on your left that looks like it leads to a wall. Turn right at the wall and you'll eventually arrive at [Orbeck of Vinheim](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Orbeck+of+Vinheim). Talk to him and he agrees to teach you in sorceries only if you have at least 10 Intelligence and promise to bring him scrolls. He then moves to Firelink Shrine. If you do not bring him any scrolls before defeating 4 bosses, he will leave

[Orbeck of Vinheim](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Orbeck+of+Vinheim) grants you different rewards based on certain criteria. If you are not a sorcerer, the [Young Dragon Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Young+Dragon+Ring) is given to you after buying three of his spells and giving him at least one scroll. You will be rewarded with the Silent Ally gesture and the [Slumbering Dragoncrest Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Slumbering+Dragoncrest+Ring) after buying Aural Decoy, Farron Flashsword, Pestilent Mist, and Spook.
There are broken steps that lead down from Orbeck's study with [Blue Bug Pellet x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blue+Bug+Pellet). Drop off to reach the final room before the boss

In this room, near one of the stone pillars, [Eygon of Carim](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Eygon+of+Carim) has casted down a summon sign. You can summon him if you have recruited Irina to your Shrine and have not harmed her
Defeat the [Crystal Sage](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Sage); receive [Soul of a Crystal Sage](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crystal+Sage)
Head down the winding paths past the Crystal Sage bonfire to find two Crystal Lizards, who will each drop a [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)

Continue following these twisting paths until you can drop down next to a large fire and the [Herald Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Herald+Set). Continue on to the Cathedral of the Deep bonfire
From the Cathedral of the Deep bonfire, head down to the left to find a hostile sword-wielding NPC and the [Paladin's Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Paladin's+Ashes) behind him

Back up by the bonfire, start heading up the first set of steps, but turn left about halfway up. Follow the path and turn right at the end for a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) in an alcove

Head back to the steps and head up to the top of this first set. Before climbing the second set of steps, head right this time and follow the path until you reach the [Crest Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crest+Shield)

From here, you can jump down and kill the axe-wielding NPC on the steps (he can be struck with a plunge attack using a big enough weapon) to get the [Spider Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Spider+Shield)
In the next area with the dogs and crossbow enemies, grab the [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler) from a ledge
Continue on and light the Cleansing Chapel bonfire inside the chapel. There is also the [Notched Whip](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Notched+Whip) in the corner
Grab the [Estus Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Shard) right outside the Cleansing Chapel bonfire where enemies are praying near an obelisk

Instead of heading up the steps past the obelisk, head right and drop down a couple of cliffs into a lower, water-filled area. Head forward a bit to grab the [Saint-tree Bellvine](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Saint-tree+Bellvine) from a stump on the right. Remember you can hold a torch to get rid of leeches

Continue down the waterway and head up the steps at the end. From the top of the steps, there will be a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) to your right and a Crystal Lizard in front of you which will drop a [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite) when killed

Farther down the path you'll encounter another Crystal Lizard which will drop another [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite). If you head up the stone steps near where the lizard was sitting initially, you can grab another [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard)

From here, you can drop down to where the [Ravenous Crystal Lizard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ravenous+Crystal+Lizard) is sleeping and kill it for a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)
Near where the Ravenous Crystal Lizard was sleeping, you'll find a narrow path between the buildings which leads to the [Poisonbite Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Poisonbite+Ring)

Turn around and head back outside and continue straight up a set of steps. Here you'll be able to grab a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) from a window and drop back down to the Cleansing Chapel bonfire

Head back out past the obelisk with the praying enemies and head up the steps into the graveyard. Take your first left and stay left to reach the [Astora Greatsword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Astora+Greatsword)

Turn around from the previous item and head straight until you reach a T-intersection. Head left, drop off, and follow the path to the end to drop down in an area with a [Fading Soul](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fading+Soul) and the [Executioner's Greatsword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Executioner's+Greatsword)

Turn around and head out of this circular area, turning left when you can and crossing a bridge. Head up a set of steps, fight the [Cathedral Grave Warden](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Cathedral+Grave+Warden), and head down more steps to the right to an area riddled with large arrows. Here you can pick up an [Undead Bone Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Undead+Bone+Shard), [Repair Powder x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Repair+Powder), a [Young White Branch](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Young+White+Branch), another [Young White Branch](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Young+White+Branch), a [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler), and finally another [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler)

Head back up to where you fought the Cathedral Grave Warden, and head up the set of steps and turn right towards a tower. You can find a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) to the left of the tower. Inside, grab the [Curse Ward Greatshield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Curse+Ward+Greatshield), head downstairs, and create another shortcut by kicking down the ladder
Head back up and out and towards the cathedral's main double doors. Head left first and roll through some crates to find [Rusted Coin x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Coin)
Heading right from the double doors, you'll find a corpse with a [Red Bug Pellet](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Red+Bug+Pellet)

Continue on across the narrow roof (watching out for ambushes) and grab the [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler) from the other side

You'll come across a few crossbow-wielding enemies in a lower area a bit farther on. Head down and kill them, then jump over onto the next buttress leading up. From above you can get the drop on a group of Thralls lying in ambush on the nearby roof. After expunging them, jump attack the other Thrall hanging on the wall, landing you right on top of [Red Bug Pellet x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Red+Bug+Pellet). At the other end of this walkway you'll find [Undead Hunter Charm x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Undead+Hunter+Charm)

Head back to the lower area where you fought the crossbow-wielding enemies. Continue down the path and take a left into a room where you can grab a [Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier). (Watch out for another Thrall ambush)
Head back outside and continue around the perimeter of the cathedral until you reach a dead end with an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)

Turn around and head back a short way to open a set of double doors which lead into the cathedral. Head left once inside and grab the [Duel Charm](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Duel+Charm) from in front of a poison-spewing statue

Continue through a dining room until you reach a lift which you can take to open a shortcut to the Cleansing Chapel bonfire. Head back up the lift and take notice of the enemy lurking above before taking the long set of steps (to the right of the balcony) down to grab a [Deep Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Deep+Gem)

Head back up and out onto the balcony. Run around the perimeter, optionally killing the giant (he's easier to kill from the area below), and grab the [Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier), [Lloyd's Sword Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lloyd's+Sword+Ring), and [Exploding Bolt x8](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Exploding+Bolt) (or save them for later if the giant is giving you trouble)

Head through the door at the other end of the balcony. Take the first left and head across a bridge-like platform (watching out for Thralls and ceiling slimes) and grab the [Seek Guidance](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Seek+Guidance) miracle
Head back across the bridge and up the ladder to grab an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)

From here, drop back down to the balcony where the giant attacked and head down the steps again. This time, head straight down to reach a room with a Mimic. Kill (or charm) it for the [Deep Braille Divine Tome](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Deep+Braille+Divine+Tome). Remember, giving this to Irina and buying any of the spells it unlocks will lock you into the bad ending of her quest. I recommend saving this for Karla, unless you really want some of the spells

From the Mimic, head down more steps and continue straight to a room with a [Deep Accursed](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Deep+Accursed) that drops [Aldrich's Sapphire](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Aldrich's+Sapphire) upon death. There is also an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) in this room

Head back to the previous room and turn right to head through a door and up some steps. If you are embered, [Longfinger Kirk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Longfinger+Kirk) will invade your world. He drops [Barbed Straight Sword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Barbed+Straight+Sword) + [Spiked Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Spiked+Shield)

Kill the giant if you haven't already (the one in the larger open area) and grab the [Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier) and the [Maiden Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Maiden+Set)

Open the double doors next to where the giant was, head down some steps, and open another set of doors. Out here you can pick up the [Saint Bident](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Saint+Bident) and [Homeward Bone x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone)

Head back up through both doors and walk forward through the water until you can turn left up some steps. You'll find a [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler) against the wall

Travel over to the other end of the large, open, water-filled area to the other giant. Kill this one and the slimes around him, and you'll be able to grab a [Pale Tongue](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pale+Tongue), the [Drang Armor Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Drang+Armor+Set), and the [Drang Hammers](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Drang+Hammers)

Head up the steps behind where the giant was sitting, kill the enemies around the shrine, and grab the [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) from the ledge that overlooks the water-filled area
The [Ring of the Evil Eye+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+the+Evil+Eye) is behind the shrine

If you turn to face the giant shrine, you should see a door to your left. Head through and you'll reach some double doors that open back out to a previous area (near the graveyard). Staying inside the cathedral, continue past these doors to reach Siegward (if he is not here, follow the first part of the next step). Grab [Duel Charm x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Duel+Charm) to the right of him. (Note: If you've already gone to the upper rafters where you drop down to Rosaria, the following encounter will not occur)

If Siegward is not there, leave the Cathedral completely (go to Firelink Shrine and come back) and then head back into the Cathedral through the large blue double doors you just opened. You will notice that a new bridge has been activated and Siegward is standing next to it. Talk to him and then cross the bridge to trigger a cutscene where it is revealed it was really Patches. Depending on if you killed the Giants or not, you'll either have to fight one or nothing happens

After being lowered, turn directly around and head through the door that's directly underneath the area Patches was standing. Head through a door and down several sets of steps to open the final shortcut to the Cleansing Chapel bonfire

As you head back through the shortcut you just opened, you should notice another door on your left immediately after you leave the chapel. Open it to reveal a lift, which will take you up to an area where you can climb a ladder to an enemy that drops the [Deep Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Deep+Ring) when killed

You can drop onto a new roof through the hole in the wall just past the enemy you just killed. Head up the roof, turn right, and begin heading down this long roof. Eventually you'll be able to turn right and head down another roof to reach an [Arbalest](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Arbalest). Head back up to the long roof and head to the end to grab a [Pale Tongue](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pale+Tongue)
The [Ring of Favor+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+Favor) is at the very opposite end

Turn around from the Pale Tongue location and head back down the long roof. Eventually, you'll be able to turn right and head back inside to the rafters of the cathedral. Head right first and grab the [Blessed Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blessed+Gem) near the wall

Zig-zag your way across the rafters towards the other end, sticking primarily to the right. Eliminate the knight with the crossbow and drop down near where he was standing to a platform with a couple of candelabras. Drop again and you'll find yourself back with Patches. He will be waiting here and pretend to not be responsible for what just happened. Tell him "You know who I am" to receive the Prostration gesture. You can speak with him again for a [Rusted Coin](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Coin). You can then buy [Siegward's Armor Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Catarina+Set) from him. (Note: Purchasing this armor means Patches will not be a rescue option for Greirat later in Irithyll of the Boreal Valley)

Before leaving this area, continue on up the nearby stairs. Kill all the enemies and the non-agressive one will drop the [Red Sign Soapstone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Red+Sign+Soapstone). Continue on and you'll eventually find yourself at the Rosaria's Bed Chamber bonfire. Speak with Rosaria to obtain the [Rosaria's Fingers](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rosaria's+Fingers) covenant. For now, do not offer her any Pale Tongues if you intend to do Sirris' quest line. We'll continue this side quest closer to the end of the game
If you killed Longfinger Kirk when he invaded earlier, you can grab the [Armor of Thorns Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Armor+of+Thorns+Set) nearby

If Patches didn't spawn at the Cathedral, return to Firelink Shrine and purchase the Tower Key if you haven't already and head into the Tower behind Firelink Shrine now. As you ascend the lift to the top, you'll hear a door shut behind you. Grab the [Fire Keeper Soul](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fire+Keeper+Soul) at the top, if you haven't before, and then come back down to encounter Patches. He has locked the door and you'll need to drop down from the bridge onto coffins to escape

Head back to the Tower and get to the bridge that overlooks Firelink Shrine. Drop down onto the roof and move around the roof until you find some windows you can go through. An [Estus Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Shard) will be on the rafters (you may have done this already in the Firelink Shrine section)

While on the roof, you can hear [Pickle-Pee, Pump-a-Rum](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pickle+Pee,+Pump-a-Rum+Crow) crow. Trading a [Homeward Bone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone) will get you the Call Over gesture and the [Iron Bracelets](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Iron+Bracelets) (you may have done this already in the Firelink Shrine section). For the other trade options see the Misc page

With the Fire Keeper Soul, you can heal Dark Sigils that you have in order to completely get rid of your Hollowing Level. If you are following Yoel/Yuria's quest line, however, don't do this until the postgame or you'll end up angering Yoel/Yuria

Refresh Firelink Shrine and head to the upper right to find Patches now located there. He'll ask for forgiveness; refuse to receive the Prostration gesture and a [Rusted Gold Coin](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Gold+Coin). You can then buy Siegward's Armor Set from him. Leaving Firelink Shrine and returning will allow Patches to be in his squatting position. Interact with him to receive the Patches Squat gesture

If you can't buy Siegward's Armor Set yet, head to the Cleansing Chapel and check the well at the entrance, where Siegward should trapped. After speaking to him, return to whatever location Patches is at for you and buy the armor
Return to the well Siegward is in and throw his armor down to him to receive the Rejoice gesture

Head back up the steps past where you defeated the second giant. Turn right at the giant shrine. If you are embered, you can summon [Anri of Astora](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Anri+of+Astora) and [Horace the Hushed](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Horace+the+Hushed) (both behind the shrine) as well as [Sirris of the Sunless Realms](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sirris+of+the+Sunless+Realms) (before the fog door). Defeat the [Deacons of the Deep](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Deacons+of+the+Deep) and you'll receive [Small Doll](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/small+doll) + [Soul of the Deacons of the Deep](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+the+Deacons+of+the+Deep)
Rest at the bonfire so you can pick up the [Archdeacon Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Archdeacon+Set) near the altar
After defeating the Deacons of the Deep, return to Firelink Shrine to find Anri and Horace. Talk to Anri to progress the questline

Farron Keep is a poisonous swamp, hence it might be a good idea to buy a few Purple Moss Clumps from the Shrine Handmaid. In addition, any item with the Quickstep weapon art (such as the Dagger, also sold by the Handmaid) could be useful as well since it allows you to move unimpeded through the deeper sections of the swamp

Leave the bonfire and enter Farron Keep proper. Turn right and in the back corner you will find [Purple Moss Clump x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Purple+Moss+Clump). Continue into the swamp from there to find [Iron Flesh](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Iron+Flesh) between some trees

Optionally, and only if you are on bad terms with Yuria (healed the Dark Sigil or attacked her) and are embered, head further into the deep swamp on the right. Dark spirit [Londor Pale Shade](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Londor+Pale+Shade) will invade your world among the Basilisks there. If you kill him, you will receive the [Manikin Claws](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Manikin+Claws)
The [Magic Stoneplate Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Magic+Stoneplate+Ring) is also in the deep swamp here
Head back to the Farron Keep bonfire, turn left this time and in the back corner you will find [Ragged Mask](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ragged+Mask) surrounded by slugs
To the right you will see a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) in the swamp
Turn right, head around the island, and in front of the partially sunken stone tower you will find an [Estus Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Shard)
To the left and past a large fire you'll see a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) before the steps leading up
Instead of taking these steps, turn left once more to find [Prism Stone x10](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Prism+Stone) on a corpse on an island
Farther out (closer to the stone wall) you will find [Stone Parma](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Stone+Parma)
From there go in direction of the rock wall on the right to find [Rotten Pine Resin x4](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rotten+Pine+Resin) against a tree

Follow this rocky wall to the left to reach a small structure guarded by a darkwraith. The [Sage's Coal](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sage's+Coal) is on a body inside this structure, granting you Crystal, Blessed, and Deep infusions

Continue on, sticking closely to the rock wall on your right until it opens to some steps, which you follow up. Go through the archway and interact with the first altar (on your left) to extinguish the flame
Go back through the archway and pick up [Rotten Pine Resin x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rotten+Pine+Resin) ahead, then go back down the steps on this side
As you arrive at the bottom of the steps, continue straight on into the deeper swamp until you find yourself between two ramp-like segments of a sunken bridge
Ascend the one on your right for [Purple Moss Clump x4](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Purple+Moss+Clump)
Turn around, cross over to the other ramp, and pick up the [Greatsword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Greatsword)
From there, look left to locate a stone pillar, behind which you pick up a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard)

Looking at the fire from there, head to your right towards the rock wall and follow that to the next fire to discover a set of steps as well as another [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard). (If you stay back as far as possible while picking it up, the [Ghru Leaper](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ghru+Leaper) on the other island should not notice you)
Head up and stick to the right to find [Purple Moss Clump x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Purple+Moss+Clump) between two trees
Snuff out the flame on the second altar
The [Dark Stoneplate Ring+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dark+Stoneplate+Ring) is behind the wall
Cross the bridge with the three Ghrus to find the Keep Ruins bonfire
The [Wolf Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Wolf+Ring) is outside near the wall of this building
Go down the ramp on the other side and enter the round structure to the right, where you will find an [Undead Bone Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Undead+Bone+Shard) amidst some slugs

From the other side of this structure you can see a ladder surrounded by slugs. Go a bit past this ladder for now and pick up [Wolf's Blood Swordgrass](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Wolf's+Blood+Swordgrass) at the foot of the tower
Step onto the nearby island to find a cauldron of Estus Soup as well as the [Sunlight Talisman](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sunlight+Talisman)
Return to the ladder you just passed and climb it
Once you reach the top, go right (don't enter the tower) to find a Crystal Lizard on the other side who drops a [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)

From the lizard go back from where you came and just before the stairs turn right to find an illusionary wall (look for an archway on the wall). Behind it you will find [Dreamchaser's Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dreamchaser's+Ashes)

Enter the room to find the Old Wolf of Farron and his bonfire. Interact with the wolf to receive the Legion Etiquette gesture and join the [Watchdogs of Farron](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Watchdogs+of+Farron) covenant
Return to Firelink Shrine and give the Dreamchaser's Ashes to the Shrine Handmaid. Reload the area and Sirris will once again be there. Talk to her to receive the Darkmoon Loyalty gesture
Warp back to the Old Wolf of Farron bonfire and go up the tower with the elevator

Turn right and on the top you can fight a [Stray Demon](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Stray+Demon) to obtain [Soul of a Stray Demon](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Stray+Demon)

Around the Stray Demon you will find a [Greataxe](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Greataxe), an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember), and another [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)
Turn around and move towards the gate. Just before and to the right of the gate is a spot where you can drop down. Do so and move along, dropping down a few ledges
After getting to the other side of the gate go left and up to find a Crystal Lizard who drops a [Heavy Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Heavy+Gem)
There are two Crystal Lizards before the dead dragon who both drop a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
In front of the dragon you can also find [Lightning Spear](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Spear)
Right next to it is the [Dragon Crest Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragon+Crest+Shield)
Go back to the ladder that led up the tower and go down. (Note: If you don't want to use a Homeward Bone you can go back by going up the gate and dropping down to the other side)
Facing away from the ladder, proceed to a small island with a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) next to a fire

From the next small island with a fire, make a quick detour to the left where the [Nameless Knight Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Nameless+Knight+Set) is stashed between a tower and a rock wall. (Going there may trigger an invasion by Yellowfinger Heysel, but she spawns out of immediate reach on the other side of the tower)

Up next is [Titanite Shard x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) in front of a tree. (If the Elder Ghru in the area is giving you trouble, you can try luring him into one of the fires for some extra damage)
Keep heading closely along the rocks on your left until you reach a way up. (If dark spirit Yellowfinger Heysel is already in your world, you might encounter her in the area upstairs)

Go up to the altar and extinguish the last of the three flames. To the right, on the other side of the small stone wall, you'll find a [Rusted Gold Coin](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Gold+Coin)
Go through the archway on the left to find [Homeward Bone x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone)

Head up the steps, fight the Ghru Leaper (if you sprint up, you should be able to backstab him), and go down on the other side. If not triggered previously, [Yellowfinger Heysel](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Yellowfinger+Heysel) will invade you here, provided you are embered. If this is your first time defeating her, you'll gain [Heysel Pick](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Heysel+Pick) + [Xanthous Crown](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Xanthous+Crown)
In the swamp area below, you will encounter some [Basilisks](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Basilisks). If you want to beef up your curse resistance, equip Archdeacon Set and Maiden Gloves
Take a right at the bottom of the steps and then enter an alcove on your left with a [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier)

Turn around and head to the other side of the steps. Tucked away in the dead end between rocks and tower is another [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier)
Turn around yet again and make your way across an island. To the right between two rock formations you can find [Repair Powder x4](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Repair+Powder)
Go right into a cave, where you will find the [Golden Scroll](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Golden+Scroll)
Make sure to give this scroll to Orbeck at Firelink Shrine to keep him from leaving (it doesn't have to be the Golden Scroll in particular, but this is the first one available)
Right next to the scroll is the [Antiquated Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Antiquated+Set) in a chest

Warp (or walk straight along the outer walls) to the Keep Ruins bonfire. Standing at the top of the ramp leading down from there, drop off to the left, directly onto a [Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard)

From here you will see a Great Crab and a white birch when looking towards the wall. Kill the crab for the [Lingering Dragoncrest Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lingering+Dragoncrest+Ring). (Lure the crab close to the white birch tree and the Giant of the Undead Settlement will assist you using his greatarrows)

Around this area you will find [Gold Pine Bundle x6](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Gold+Pine+Bundle), an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember), a [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler), a [Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier), a [Young White Branch](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Young+White+Branch), another [Young White Branch](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Young+White+Branch), and the [Crown of Dusk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crown+of+Dusk)
Follow the wall to your right and you'll eventually find the [Sage's Scroll](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sage's+Scroll), guarded by Ghrus near several dead mushrooms

If you continue in the same direction along the wall you will encounter three Elder Ghrus. Lure these enemies out one by one to get [Black Bow of Pharis](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Bow+of+Pharis) and [Pharis's Hat](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pharis's+Hat). In the middle you can find a [Poison Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Poison+Gem). (If you do not wish to engage the Elder Ghrus in melee, you can instead whittle them down using ranged weapons from up by the Keep Ruins bonfire)
Warp (or backtrack) to the Keep Ruins bonfire, go down the ramp and through the opened gate. Straight ahead is a [Shriving Stone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shriving+Stone)
Follow the path and once you're in an open area turn right and enter the structure to get to the Farron Keep Perimeter bonfire
Take the path farther into the structure to encounter a Ravenous Crystal Lizard who drops [Titanite Scale x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)
Right next to him is the [Great Magic Weapon](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Great+Magic+Weapon) sorcery
Open the shortcut back to the Road of Sacrifices
Turn around and go back in direction of the bonfire. After the first set of stairs you can go through the broken wall on the left and drop down
Here you can find [Atonement](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Atonement) and on the right side of the cliff you can find a [Hollow Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hollow+Gem)

If you want to be able to access [Yuria of Londor](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Yuria+of+Londor) and the Usurpation of Fire ending, make sure that, before proceeding to fight the Abyss Watchers, you have Drawn Out True Strength 5 times with Yoel and then reload Firelink Shrine so that Yoel dies and Yuria appears. You can talk to her to receive the Dignified Bow gesture and buy the [Londor Braille Divine Tome](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Londor+Braille+Divine+Tome)

Before fighting the Abyss Watchers, remember to give Orbeck the [Golden Scroll](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Golden+Scroll) and/or [Sage's Scroll](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sage's+Scroll)

Buy Aural Decoy, Farron Flashsword, Pestilent Mist, and Spook from Orbeck. Then talk to him multiple times to obtain the [Young Dragon Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Young+Dragon+Ring), the Silent Ally gesture, and the [Slumbering Dragoncrest Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Slumbering+Dragoncrest+Ring)
Go back to the Farron Keep Perimeter bonfire and leave the building
To the right of the Ghrus you can find an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)
Go up the right side and on the hill you will find [Black Bug Pellet x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Bug+Pellet)

You can summon [Yellowfinger Heysel](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Yellowfinger+Heysel) in Farron Keep right after the Keep Ruins bonfire, but only if you have offered a Pale Tongue to Rosaria, which will block you out of Sirris' quest line, so I recommend saving this part for another playthrough. You'll gain the Proper Bow gesture after her summon
[Black Hand Gotthard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Hand+Gotthard) can be summoned and will grant you the By My Sword gesture. His summon sign is up the first set of stairs
[Sirris](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sirris+of+the+Sunless+Realms) can also be summoned here. Her sign is to the left of the mausoleum entrance

If you are on good terms with Yuria, you can also summon the [Londor Pale Shade](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Londor+Pale+Shade) and gain the Duel Bow gesture. His summon sign is right next to the Farron Keep Perimeter bonfire. (Note: In order to be able to summon two phantoms at the same time, you have to use [Dried Finger](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dried+Finger). Black Hand Gotthard and Londor Pale Shade can also be summoned for another later fight, so don't worry about getting all the gestures here at once)

Defeat the [Abyss Watchers](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Abyss+Watchers); receive [Cinders of a Lord](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Cinders+of+a+Lord) + [Soul of the Blood of the Wolf](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+the+Blood+of+the+Wolf)

If you have collected all the items around the three white birch trees so far, you'll find the [Hawk Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hawk+Ring) back where the giant was in Undead Settlement

Return to Firelink Shrine and talk with Hawkwood to receive the [Farron Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Farron+Ring). (If Hawkwood isn't sitting on the stairs inside the Shrine, reload the area until he does)

Reload the area, and Hawkwood should no longer be present. [Hawkwood's Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hawkwood's+Shield) will be on the ground by a gravestone outside of Firelink Shrine, near where the dog spawns
Eygon of Carim should also now be in Firelink Shrine. Exhaust his dialogue now so he is available for a boss fight later on
Warp back to the Abyss Watchers bonfire, enter the Catacombs of Carthus and on the left side you'll find [Carthus Rouge x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Carthus+Rouge)
The [Ring of Steel Protection+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+Steel+Protection) is on a pillar below the bridge

After crossing the bridge, go up the stairs to the left and then immediately turn around to your right. There is [Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier) at the end of the way
Turn back the other way, and follow the path down a ladder. At the bottom you'll find another [Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier)

Follow the path and in the room with the pillars strike the wall on the right side to reveal an illusory wall. Behind it you'll find the [Carthus Pyromancy Tome](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Carthus+Pyromancy+Tome)
Back in the pillar room you can find a [Sharp Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sharp+Gem) on the right side
In the next room you'll find [Titanite Shard x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) in the leftmost corner

Before heading down the giant staircase that a skeleton ball will eventually begin to roll up and down, there will be a hallway to the left you can take. Head down this way and you'll eventually run into Anri, who claims to be looking for Horace. Exhaust the dialogue

Head out onto the platform next to Anri, kill a Crystal Lizard for a [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite), and grab [Bloodred Moss Clump x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Bloodred+Moss+Clump) on the right side
Go back to the giant staircase and on the left side is an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)

Once arriving at the bottom of the giant staircase, you'll notice a skeleton with a hat on its head hiding right in the corner of the next room. Kill it and the next time the skeleton ball hits the bottom gate, it'll explode and reveal an [Undead Bone Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Undead+Bone+Shard)
In the next hallway you can find the [Carthus Milkring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Carthus+Milkring) on the right side behind some big vases
The [Thunder Stoneplate Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Thunder+Stoneplate+Ring) is also between these vases
