On the corpse in the bone-ridden hallway is a [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler). At the end of the hallway is an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember). (Be careful, there is a hole in the ground)
In the corner where the second skeleton ball spawns is a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
Activate the Catacombs of Carthus bonfire in the left hallway

Go down the stairs, turn right and right again to get to a hallway with [Skeleton Wheels](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Skeleton+Wheel). On the left wall is [Titanite Shard x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard)
At the end of the hallway you will find the [Carthus Bloodring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Carthus+Bloodring)
Go back to the main room to find [Titanite Shard x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Shard) on a corpse that is lying by a pillar
To the right of the corpse is an illusory wall. Hit it and go up the stairs to find the [Grave Warden's Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Grave+Warden's+Ashes)
Turn around and go towards the other side, finding a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) on the right side
Kill the skeleton with the hat and the skeleton ball will break revealing a [Dark Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dark+Gem)
Stay on the second level and you'll find [Carthus Rouge x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Carthus+Rouge) next to the archer skeleton
Go down to the pillar room and head inside the tunnel just past the illusory wall to find a Crystal Lizard who drops a [Fire Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fire+Gem)
Exit the tunnel to find [Yellow Bug Pellet x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Yellow+Bug+Pellet) on the left side

Go to the gate with the skeletons to find a [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier) and [Black Bug Pellet x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Bug+Pellet)
Open the gate and get the [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) on the other side

Go through the tunnel that leads to the main pillar room. If you're embered, you'll be invaded by [Knight Slayer Tsorig](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Knight+Slayer+Tsorig). Regardless of who wins the fight, you will receive the My Thanks! gesture. Defeating him will grant you the [Knight Slayer's Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Knight+Slayer's+Ring)

Turn around and just before the bridge go right and follow the path to Anri. Once again you'll be asked whether you have found Horace. You haven't yet, but we're about to. Be sure to exhaust the dialogue
Get down to the left of Anri and follow to the path the next boss
Defeat [High Lord Wolnir](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/High+Lord+Wolnir); receive [Soul of High Lord Wolnir](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+High+Lord+Wolnir)

During the battle you had an opportunity to grab the [Grave Warden Pyromancy Tome](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Grave+Warden+Pyromancy+Tome), but should you have not picked it up then it can now be found in the far left corner of the goblet room. Cornyx can't read this pyromancy tome, so you'll have to wait until you free Karla to turn it in
From the High Lord Wolnir bonfire go back to the bridge and hit the supports to create a ladder
Head down to find a room with a [Demon](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Demon) who drops a [Soul of a Demon](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Demon) after killing him
In the same room on the top level is a Mimic which drops the [Black Blade](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Blade)

Go down the stairs to find [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) and [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier)
Go down the stairs to find [Old Sage's Blindfold](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Old+Sage's+Blindfold) + [Witch's Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Witch's+Ring)
Activate the Abandoned Tomb bonfire

When heading towards the Old Demon King fog door, a Carthus Sandworm will appear out of the ground. Align the worm between the ballista and yourself, such that the ballista kills the worm while you are standing in a terrain safe spot. You'll gain [Lightning Stake](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Stake) + [Undead Bone Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Undead+Bone+Shard)

Around the front part of the lake you will find the [Shield of Want](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shield+of+Want) as well as 5 pickups containing one [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) each

Obtain the [Speckled Stoneplate Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Speckled+Stoneplate+Ring) which is located on a corpse in Smouldering Lake behind a brick wall. Go along the left wall when looking from the fog door to find the wall. You will need to trick the ballista into destroying the brick wall

Follow the left wall farther into the lake to find a [Chaos Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Chaos+Gem) and around the middle of the lake you will see a brick floor; stand on it to trick the ballista into destroying the floor to unlock a shortcut but do not decend into it
Go up the slope to the right of the fog door for another [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) as well as the Demon Ruins bonfire down the stairs
On the top floor go into the left corner to find an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)

Go right and fight some Grus to find an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember). From here you can see an item, an [Estus Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Shard). It's not recommended to jump for it, we'll get it later
Head back into the first room, go down the stairs and in the back left you'll find another [Undead Bone Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Undead+Bone+Shard)

In this room take the left hallway on the other side (not the one with the rat). Hit the illusory wall at the end and pick up the [Black Knight Sword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Knight+Sword)
The [Flame Stoneplate Ring+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Flame+Stoneplate+Ring) is in a corner

Go out, right and follow this way until you get to a room with some stairs. Take a left before the stairs, then right to find an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember). Now go up the stairs to find the Old King's Antechamber bonfire
From the bonfire go into the nearest hallway and follow the right path until you find a Crystal Lizard who drops a [Chaos Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Chaos+Gem)
Take the straight path from the Old King's Antchechamber bonfire and you'll find the [Izalith Pyromancy Tome](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Izalith+Pyromancy+Tome) on the ground

In the Old King's Antechamber there is an illusory wall to the right of the stairs in the corner. Activate it and then move down the hallway that has loads of Writhing Rotten Flesh enemies on the ceiling and grab the [Estus Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Shard) on a body at the end
Turn around and take the left to get back into the main room. From here go into the hallway that is in the left corner (the one with the rat)

Take the right before the rat, hit the illusory wall straight ahead. Take a left and pick up the [Quelana Pyromancy Tome](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Quelana+Pyromancy+Tome). Only Karla can read this tome

In the lava-filled room right next to the tome you can find [Toxic Mist](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Toxic+Mist) and [White Hair Talisman](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/White+Hair+Talisman)

Head back and keep on taking right turns until you reach a hallway downstairs with a big rat. Reveal an illusory wall on the left side of this hallway and grab [Large Titanite Shard x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) from a chest
Behind the chest is another illusory wall. Drop down a ledge to get the [Izalith Staff](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Izalith+Staff)
In the room with the Basilisks is a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)

Before going up the stairs take a left when you get to them and you'll encounter [Knight Slayer Tsorig](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Knight+Slayer+Tsorig). Regardless of who wins the fight, you will receive the My Thanks! gesture (if you haven't gotten it before). After killing him, he will drop [Fume Ultra Greatsword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fume+Ultra+Greatsword) + [Black Iron Greatshield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Iron+Greatshield). If this is your first time defeating him, he will drop the [Knight Slayer's Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Knight+Slayer's+Ring) as well. Also, the [Black Iron Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Iron+Set) can be obtained via the [Shrine Handmaid](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shrine+Handmaid)
In this lava room you can get [Sacred Flame](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sacred+Flame) and an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)
Go back to the stairs and cross the bridge for a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)
Go up the ladder, then another ladder and drop down to the right to find the [Dragonrider Bow](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragonrider+Bow)
Exit the tunnel at the top to get back to the Smouldering Lake. Drop down on the left to find [Homeward Bone x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone) next to the wall
The [Bloodbite Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Bloodbite+Ring) is near the ballista

After shutting off the ballista, you'll notice some cliffs that you can drop onto that will eventually lead you back to the lake. You'll also land right in front of a cave you haven't explored (you can also get here just by running to the right from the Abandoned Tomb bonfire). Head inside to find two Crystal Lizards who drop [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite) and [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)

You'll also find Horace, who has succumbed to his Dark Sigils and become hostile. Kill him and he'll drop the [Llewellyn Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Llewellyn+Shield). The Shrine Handmaid will also now sell Horace's [Executioner's Armor Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Executioner+Set)

Inside here you will also find [Yellow Bug Pellet x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Yellow+Bug+Pellet), a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard), and another [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)

If you killed Horace but have not yet defeated High Lord Wolnir, you can go back to the Catacombs and speak with Anri above the wooden bridge. Tell of the Smouldering Lake and you'll be given the [Ring of the Evil Eye](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+the+Evil+Eye). If Wolnir has already been destroyed, Anri will be gone from the Catacombs and you will be given the ring on your next meeting in Irithyll of the Boreal Valley

Before fighting the Old Demon King you can summon Knight Slayer Tsorig (next to the Demon Ruins bonfire, if you defeated him in Catacombs of Carthus) and Great Swamp Cuculus (in front of the fog door). If the Great Swamp Cuculus survives the fight, go back to the cage in Undead Settlement you found Cornyx in to receive [Spotted Whip](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Spotted+Whip) + [Cornyx's Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Cornyx's+Set)
Defeat the [Old Demon King](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Old+Demon+King); receive [Soul of the Old Demon King](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+the+Old+Demon+King)

When first arriving in Irithyll, you'll battle one of [Sulyvahn's Beasts](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sulyvahn's+Beast), which drops [Pontiff's Right Eye](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pontiff's+Right+Eye), and then move through a force field to the Central Irithyll bonfire. If you run past the beast, it will despawn and you will encounter it later in a more challenging area. Light the bonfire and return to the middle of the bridge and Sirris' summon sign should be there if you've been following her quest. Activate it and you'll enter her world and have to fight [Creighton the Wanderer](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Creighton+the+Wanderer). After defeating the invader, visit Firelink Shrine and she will give you [Blessed Mail Breaker](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Mail+Breaker) + [Silvercat Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Silvercat+Ring) for the troubles
Just before the barrier you will find one [Homeward Bone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone)

Around the fountain you can find [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier), [Rime-blue Moss Clump](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rime-blue+Moss+Clump), and [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)
Go up the stairs and to the left on the railing is a [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)
Going straight and up the two stairs to the right is a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)

On the fountain up ahead are [Budding Green Blossom](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Budding+Green+Blossom) and [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier)
A bit farther and to the left next to a tree is [Rime-blue Moss Clump x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rime-blue+Moss+Clump)

Go up to the [Fire Witch](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Burning+Stake+Witch) to get the [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
To the left of the main road is a Crystal Lizard who drops a [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)
Attack the railing to the right of the lizard to reveal a staircase. Go down and to the right is a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
Kill the Evangelist in the area below for [Dorhys' Gnawing](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dorhy's+Gnawing)
Pick up the [Witchtree Branch](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Witchtree+Branch), open the gate, and go back to where the lizard was
Just before the crossroads is a [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier)
Take the right here and pick up the [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) from a corpse
Now take the left at the crossroads and before going up to the church is a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) to the left
Go upstairs and inside, light the Church of Yorshka bonfire, and pick up [Proof of a Concord Kept](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Proof+of+a+Concord+Kept) from a corpse in the back

Anri will be in the same room. Exhaust the dialogue to receive the Quiet Resolve gesture. You will also be given the [Ring of the Evil Eye](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+the+Evil+Eye) if not obtained previously. Next is the major dividing point in Anri's story: From here on out, if you want to follow this quest line to its conclusion, follow Anri A. If you want the Usurpation of Fire ending, follow Anri B

Anri A Progress: (Slayer of Aldrich Ending) Look towards the side of the room that has some stone statues. One of these is actually a pilgrim in disguise sent by Yuria. Slash away at the statues until you find him and make sure he's dead. He'll drop the [Chameleon](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Chameleon) sorcery for you as well
Anri B Progress: (Lord of Hollows Ending) Do nothing in regards to the pilgrim

From the bonfire go down the stairs and turn right to find the [Roster of Knights](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Roster+of+Knights). Go out onto the graveyard and look for a [Fading Soul](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fading+Soul) near the cliff. To the right near a tree is another [Fading Soul](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fading+Soul)
In front of the large tombstone at the end of this path is [Homeward Bone x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone)

An [Undead Bone Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Undead+Bone+Shard) is located behind the grave. If you helped Sirris, [Creighton the Wanderer](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Creighton+the+Wanderer) will invade you here if you're embered. Killing him will gain you the [Dragonslayer's Axe](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragonslayer's+Axe) and allow you to grab Creighton's [Mirrah Chain Armor Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Mirrah+Chain+Set) on the bridge where you used Sirris' summon sign

From the entrance to the graveyard go down the stairs on the left and left again to get to [Kukri x8](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Kukri) and [Rusted Gold Coin](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Gold+Coin)
Now take the other way to get to a dark room. On the ground level of this room is [Blue Bug Pellet x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blue+Bug+Pellet)

Up on the rafters is a [Shriving Stone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shriving+Stone) and in the chest on the mid level is [Yorshka's Spear](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Yorshka's+Spear)
The [Covetous Gold Serpent Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Covetous+Gold+Serpent+Ring) is on a platform below the broken railing outside

Go down to the stairs and right just before the lake. The wall in the first right tunnel is an illusory wall with a Crystal Lizard behind it who drops [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)
Past the other tunnel and next to the tree is a [Blood Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blood+Gem)
Jump into the lake from here for a [Ring of Sacrifice](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+Sacrifice)

In the lake you'll find a bundle of [Green Blossom x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Green+Blossom), a [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier), the [Great Heal](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Great+Heal) miracle (it's on the right side of the lake that is below the entrance to Irithyll), another [Green Blossom x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Green+Blossom) bundle, and finally an individual [Green Blossom](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Green+Blossom)
Activate the Distant Manor bonfire while you're here, then head back upstairs
Enter the sewers from the lake and pick up two droppings: [Dung Pie x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dung+Pie) and [Dung Pie x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dung+Pie)
In the corner opposite some stairs are the [Excrement-covered Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Excrement-covered+Ashes)

Head up these stairs and you'll find [Siegward of Catarina](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Siegward+of+Catarina) hanging out by the fire. Exhaust his dialogue and you'll receive the [Emit Force](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Emit+Force) miracle, a [Siegbräu](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Siegbrau), and any gestures you missed from his first encounter

The first Silver Knight you encounter in the next room drops [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) + [Divine Blessing](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Divine+Blessing). Head up the stairs on the left to find two more Silver Knights who both drop [Large Titanite Shard x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) as well as three chests containing the [Leo Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Leo+Ring), [Smough's Great Hammer](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Smough's+Great+Hammer), and a [Divine Blessing](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Divine+Blessing)
The [Wood Grain Ring+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Wood+Grain+Ring) is outside in an alcove to the right

If you are on bad terms with Yuria (healed the Dark Sigil or attacked her or killed the assassin in the Church of Yorshka) and are embered, dark spirit [Londor Pale Shade](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Londor+Pale+Shade) will invade your world after the Silver Knights' room. (Note: If you are currently eligible for the invasion by [Creighton the Wanderer](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Creighton+the+Wanderer), you will have to eliminate that one first to get Londor Pale Shade to spawn.) If this is your first time killing him, you will receive the [Manikin Claws](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Manikin+Claws). If you defeated [Londor Pale Shade](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Londor+Pale+Shade) in both of his invasions, then you can pick up the [Pale Shade Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pale+Shade+Set) near Yuria's location in Firelink Shrine

Next to the stairs here is a [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier) and farther up on a railing is a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
You can take the elevator here and open the gate for a shortcut

In the next room up ahead you can find [Blue Bug Pellet x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blue+Bug+Pellet) on a corpse and if you go down the ladder at the top you can find a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
Go outside to find a [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)
Go down the left side of the fog door and get the [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) from a corpse and open the shortcut

Go up to the fog door again and drop down to the altar for the [Ring of the Sun's First Born](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+the+Sun's+First+Born) and a [Lightning Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Gem)
The [Chloranthy Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Chloranthy+Ring) is behind the altar
The wall to the left of the altar (with your back to it) is an illusory wall with the [Magic Clutch Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Magic+Clutch+Ring) behind it

Turn around and take the exit opposite of you to get the [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior) from where the Fire Witch is as well as another [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior) above it

Return to Firelink Shrine and talk to [Greirat of the Undead Settlement](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Greirat+of+the+Undead+Settlement). He will ask to pillage Irithyll. Only do this after confirming Siegward is in Irithyll OR if Patches still has Siegward's armor. If you have neither, Greirat will perish and his ashes can be found in the sewer area

If you did not purchase Siegward's armor you can send Patches out to rescue Greirat. Refresh Firelink Shrine after sending Greirat out and Patches will ask you where he went. Tell him and Patches will head out to rescue Greirat

[Black Hand Gotthard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Hand+Gotthard) can be summoned for the Pontiff Sulyvahn fight. If this is the first time you've summoned him, you'll receive the By My Sword gesture

If you are following the Yoel/Yuria quest line, you can summon the [Londor Pale Shade](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Londor+Pale+Shade). If this is the first time you've summoned them, you'll receive the Duel Bow gesture
[Anri of Astora](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Anri+of+Astora) can also be summoned instead of the Londor Pale Shade
Defeat [Pontiff Sulyvahn](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pontiff+Sulyvahn); receive [Soul of Pontiff Sulyvahn](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+Pontiff+Sulyvahn)
Yuria/Anri B Progress: Head back to Firelink Shrine after defeating Pontiff and talk to Yuria and she'll discuss that the "marriage ceremony" is almost complete
Greirat should have also returned from his pillage
Go right after exiting from the Pontiff bonfire to find a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
In the same area are two Crystal Lizards who drop [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)
Go to the left of the courtyard and enter the dark section. At the back you'll find the [Dark Stoneplate Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dark+Stoneplate+Ring)

Enter the cathedral from the top of the dark section, unlock an elevator shortcut back down to Sulyvahn's room, and cross the bridge to the other side to find a Mimic who has the [Golden Ritual Spear](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Golden+Ritual+Spear)
The [Ring of Favor+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+Favor) is at the other end
Cross the bridge and go around to the other side to find a Crystal Lizard who drops a [Simple Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Simple+Gem)
Exit the same way you entered and go right to find a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) on a corpse

On the courtyard itself you can find a [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior), a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard), an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember), and another [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)
At the end of the courtyard are two NPCs and one of them drops the [Drang Twinspears](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Drang+Twinspears)

Once you enter the building after the giant courtyard, there will be an illusory wall on the left side that reveals a long ladder down. Head down and defeat two of [Sulyvahn's Beasts](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sulyvahn's+Beast) (killing them grants you the [Ring of Favor](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+Favor)) and interact with [Archdeacon McDonnell](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Archdeacon+McDonnell) to gain the [Aldrich Faithful](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Aldrich+Faithful) covenant. You can also find [Human Dregs](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Human+Dregs), a [Deep Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Deep+Gem), and the Water Reserve bonfire in this room
After going up the stairs in the building where the illusory wall was you can find a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) on a corpse in one of the outside corners
On the right side of the right tower where you can walk up to the archers is a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
As you make your way up the building with the Silver Knight archers, you can drop down to a roof below and find the [Easterner's Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Easterner's+Ashes)

Before you enter the hallway that leads to the lift turn around and walk down to the lower tower for a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) and open the shortcut in the next tower

As you walk back from the shortcut to the hallway you will see [Dragonslayer Greatbow](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragonslayer+Greatbow) + [Dragonslayer Greatarrow x5](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragonslayer+Greatarrow) on a lower platform

Anri B Progress: Before activating the lift to Anor Londo, there is a path that goes down in the room before the lever. Here you'll find the pilgrim waiting for you. He'll give you the [Sword of Avowal](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sword+of+Avowal) and tell you Anri is waiting ahead. Head down, picking up the [Brass Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Brass+Set) along the way, to find Anri's body at the altar. Perform the Rite of Avowal and you'll gain 3 Dark Sigils, granting you the total amount of 8 Dark Sigils you need for the Usurpation of Fire ending. To the right of the altar, you will find the [Reversal Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Reversal+Ring). Revisit the pilgrim and you will discover he is now dead with the [Chameleon](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Chameleon) sorcery on his body
Anri B Progress: You can reload the area and pick up [Anri's Straight Sword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Anri's+Straight+Sword) from where Anri was lying

Anri A Progress: You will find an illusory wall where the path down to the altar would be. You can find the [Brass Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Brass+Set) and [Reversal Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Reversal+Ring) in the same places
Before the lift is an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)

After using the lift to get to Anor Londo, run back down the stairs and you'll be able to see a tower in the distance. Walk across the sky on an invisible floor (don't worry, you can't fall off at the sides) and continue walking straight until lined up with the tower, then walk towards it. You'll find [Company Captain Yorshka](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Company+Captain+Yorshka) who will allow you into the [Blade of the Darkmoon](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blades+of+the+Darkmoon) covenant if you perform the Darkmoon Loyalty gesture

If you drop down the tower you can find [Painting Guardian's Curved Sword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Painting+Guardian's+Curved+Sword) as well as the [Painting Guardian Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Painting+Guardian+Set). Warp back to the Anor Londo bonfire
[Havel's Ring+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Havel's+Ring) can also be found in the tower
Anri B Progress: If you didn't get it before, you can return to where Anri's body was to find [Anri's Straight Sword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Anri's+Straight+Sword)
On the left after going up the stairs to Anor Londo is a [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)
On the right platform with the red-eyed knight is a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)
Head left and you'll find the Giant Blacksmith's corpse with the [Giant's Coal](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Giant's+Coal) by his body, granting you Lightning, Simple, and Chaos infusions
After entering the main hall turn left and next to the Deacons is a [Proof of a Concord Kept](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Proof+of+a+Concord+Kept)
On the other side you can find [Moonlight Arrow x6](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Moonlight+Arrow)

In the main room of the castle, you will be ambushed by a [Deep Accursed](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Deep+Accursed) enemy. Defeating him will provide you with [Aldrich's Ruby](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Aldrich's+Ruby)

Looking at the fog door you will find a chest on the left side, surrounded by [Rotten Flesh of Aldrich](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rotten+Flesh+of+Aldrich) enemies, with an [Estus Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Shard) inside

Anri A Progress: If you killed Horace in Smouldering Lake, Anri's summoning sign will appear outside in front of the large, golden doors in Anor Londo. Using this sign will cause you to be summoned as a phantom to help kill Aldrich

Defeat [Aldrich, Devourer of Gods](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Aldrich,+Devourer+of+Gods); receive [Cinders of a Lord](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Cinders+of+a+Lord) + [Soul of Aldrich](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+Aldrich)
After defeating Aldrich, take the elevator up and you will discover the [Sun Princess Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sun+Princess+Ring) in Gwynevere's Chamber

Anri A Progress: Return to Firelink Shrine and talk to Ludleth who hands you [Anri's Straight Sword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Anri's+Straight+Sword), which was left with him as a thanks to you

Anri A Progress: Anri has also succumbed to the Dark Sigils and become hostile. If you told Anri of Horace's location in Smouldering Lake, go there. If not, go up the first set of stairs from the Cathedral of the Deep bonfire and take a right then follow the path up the hill. Killing Anri allows you to purchase the Elite Knight Armor Set from the Shrine Handmaid

If you are following Sirris' quest and have defeated Aldrich, travel to Undead Settlement via either the Cliff Underside or Dilapidated Bridge bonfire and make your way back to the room before the Curse-rotted Greatwood fight. You will find Sirris' summon sign right before the giant hole that leads to the Pit of Hollows. You'll be summoned to fight [Holy Knight Hodrick](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Holy+Knight+Hodrick), who turns out to be Sirris' grandfather. After defeating Holy Knight Hodrick, you will gain the [Mound-makers](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Mound-Maker) covenant (if not obtained before). The [Sunset Armor Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sunset+Armor+Set) will be available in the Pit of Hollows bonfire area and you will find the [Sunset Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sunset+Shield) on a grave at the cliff outside of Firelink Shrine (from the Iudex Gundyr bonfire go up the first set of stairs, then right)

After defeating [Holy Knight Hodrick](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Holy+Knight+Hodrick), Sirris will return to Firelink Shrine and she will ask to be your knight. Agree and she'll be able to be summoned for the final three main boss fights of the game. Refuse and you'll find her hollow in the Pit of Hollows

Warp to the Distant Manor bonfire, follow the path down, and drop down immediately for a [Rusted Gold Coin](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Gold+Coin). Drop farther down to find a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) behind a pillar

When you are outside on a cliffside path, [Alva, Seeker of the Spurned](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Alva,+Seeker+of+the+Spurned), will invade if you are embered. He drops the [Murakumo](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Murakumo) when killed
The first cell on the left has a [Rusted Coin](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Coin) in it
The second cell on the same side has a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
On the outer path is a [Fading Soul](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fading+Soul)
At the end of the path is a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
Drop down to the lower level for a [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier)
Continue down this path and in a cell you'll find the [Old Sorcerer Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Old+Sorcerer+Set)
The last cell will contain an enemy who drops [Great Magic Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Great+Magic+Shield)
Go back to the upper level, cross the bridge in the middle, and the last cell on the right contains a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
Turn around and enter the next cell to find [Pale Pine Resin x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pale+Pine+Resin) near the destroyed wall
Go through the rooms and enter the last cell on the other side to find [Jailbreaker's Key](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Jailbreaker's+Key), then reverse direction and open the shortcut door

Cross the bridge back to the other side, head left, and open the window grate at the end of the hallway using your newly acquired key. Drop down the ledge here to find the [Bellowing Dragoncrest Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Bellowing+Dragoncrest+Ring) on the left
After jumping down to the bridge head left for [Homeward Bone x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone)
Re-enter the dungeon via the door here and kill the Crystal Lizard who drops a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)
The next room on this hallway holds a [Simple Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Simple+Gem) in a small side room on the right
Retrace your steps all the way outside, then head downstairs and kill the Mimic in the next room for an [Estus Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Shard)
Go down the hallway in the next room to find a [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)

If you want you can go back to the entrance, jump down the first hole, and quickly take out the Crystal Lizard for a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk) (the giant only becomes hostile if you attack it, so you can safely take out the lizard). Otherwise wait until you've defeated the giant. If you are patient you can kill the giant right here. In front of the giant is a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)
If you don't want to deal with the giant right now go back to where you found the Soul of a Weary Warrior and drop down the hole
Before the gate is a [Pickaxe](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pickaxe)
Go up the tunnel for a [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)

You'll find two chests at the end of a hallway. The chest on the left is a Mimic with the [Dark Clutch Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dark+Clutch+Ring). After you have taken the [Old Cell Key](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Old+Cell+Key) from the right chest, you will be ambushed by several [Basilisks](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Basilisk). The Old Cell Key will be used to free Siegward later
Turn around, enter the tunnel on the left, and in the next room find [Dung Pie x4](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dung+Pie)
After entering the big room with the jailers go left for a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)

Continue through the tunnel and near the lift is a dragon statue that has the [Dragon Torso Stone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragon+Torso+Stone). This area will be used later to access the Archdragon Peak once you have the Path of the Dragon gesture
Go up the lift and find a [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier) next to the shortcut to the main dungeon
If you jump off the elevator midway, you'll find the [Lightning Blade](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Blade) miracle

Return to the room with several Jailers. To the left, you'll discover a cell containing five [Wretches](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Wretch) and the [Profaned Coal](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Profaned+Coal), which grants Dark, Blood, and Hollow infusions
In the middle of the room is an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember). On the right side is another [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)
In the short tunnel on the left is a Mimic with [Titanite Scale x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)

In the cell on the far left side, you'll find the [Xanthous Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Xanthous+Ashes) and the [Dusk Crown Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dusk+Crown+Ring)

The middle cell on the right holds [Karla](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Karla), but is locked. You'll find the [Jailer's Key Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Jailer's+Key+Ring) in the next zone
In front of Karla's cell, you'll find the [Alva Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Alva+Set) (this set only appears if you have killed Alva at the start of the dungeon)
Head outside and before crossing the bridge go left for a [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)

At the first bonfire you will find poor Laddersmith Gilligan's dead corpse. You'll receive the Stretch Out gesture and an [Undead Bone Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Undead+Bone+Shard) from examining it
Climb back down, go outside using the hole in the wall, and take the ladder to the left to find [Rusted Coin x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Coin)
The [Magic Stoneplate Ring+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Magic+Stoneplate+Ring) is at the end of the broken stairs leading down

Use the plank ramp next to the Gargoyle that ambushes you to enter a room with two Crystal Lizards who drop [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite). In the back left you can find a [Rusted Gold Coin](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Gold+Coin)
Go outside onto the planks and on the right side you can find [Blooming Purple Moss Clump x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blooming+Purple+Moss+Clump)

In the toxic swamp below you can find the [Cursebite Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Cursebite+Ring) and a [Poison Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Poison+Gem) (in the cave behind where you drop down), a [Purging Stone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Purging+Stone) (in the open), and a [Shriving Stone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shriving+Stone) (behind the building)

Enter the building on the ground floor to find [Hand Ogres](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hand+Ogre) (I recommend using a weapon with bleed effect and/or [Carthus Rouge](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Carthus+Rouge)). If you kill one, you will receive the [Eleonora](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Eleonora) axe. In the same room is [Purging Stone x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Purging+Stone)
Climb the ladder, take the stairs to the top of the building in this area, and kill the court sorcerer to receive [Logan's Scroll](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Logan's+Scroll)
The [Flame Stoneplate Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Flame+Stoneplate+Ring) is down below, on top of the ground floor entrance
There is [Poison Arrow x18](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Poison+Arrow) on the right side of the roof
Fall down from the top of the roof into the building for the [Wrath of the Gods](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Wrath+of+the+Gods) miracle

In this room, you will find the [Court Sorcerer Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Court+Sorcerer+Set) and a Mimic chest containing the [Court Sorcerer's Staff](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Court+Sorcerer's+Staff)
Go down the stairs here to find some [Rubbish](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rubbish)

On the roof where you fought the court sorcerer, look torwards the stairs against the wall. You should see an open window which you can jump into. This leads to the cell that Siegward is stuck in. Open it and exhaust his dialogue, he'll give you a [Titanite Slab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Slab) for saving him. The [Covetous Gold Serpent Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Covetous+Gold+Serpent+Ring) is in the same room

Return to the roof and follow the stairway up. At the top of the stairs, attack into the alcove directly in front of you to unveil two invisible Jailers. At the end of the hall is the [Jailer's Key Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Jailer's+Key+Ring), which is used to free Karla
Exit through the hole in the wall to end up in the giant's cell. If you haven't killed him yet, do so now

In this room you can also pick up the [Profaned Flame](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Profaned+Flame) pyromancy, a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard), and another [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
Exit the room through the tunnel on the left, go up the elevator, and open the shortcut to the Irithyll Dungeon bonfire
The [Covetous Silver Serpent Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Covetous+Silver+Serpent+Ring) is on a platform in the elevator shaft
Go back to the giant's cell and exit the opposite way for a Mimic chest with [Dragonslayer Lightning Arrow x10](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragonslayer+Lightning+Arrow)
Go up the ladder and jump from rafter to rafter for [Lightning Bolt x9](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Bolt)

With the giant dead, take out the Crystal Lizard for a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk) and pick up a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight) (if you haven't done so before)

From here you can also go to where Karla's cell is and send her to Firelink Shrine. Give her the two remaining pyromancy tomes and, with some effort, you can also give her the [Londor Braille Divine Tome](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Londor+Braille+Divine+Tome) and [Deep Braille Divine Tome](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Deep+Braille+Divine+Tome) instead of corrupting Irina

Teleport to the Irithyll Dungeon bonfire and open the last cell on the right in the first section for a [Rusted Gold Coin](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Gold+Coin). Now drop down before the window you opened before, turn around, and open the first cell on the left which contains the [Prisoner Chief's Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Prisoner+Chief's+Ashes)
Go back to the Profaned Capital bonfire

Take the ladder on the wall down and cross the bridge for [Onislayer Greatarrow x8](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Onislayer+Greatarrow) and a [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior) farther on
From the bridge drop down onto the structure below to find a matching [Onislayer Greatbow](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Onislayer+Greatbow)

Drop farther down and loot a [Rusted Coin](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Coin). At the end of the platform you can find another [Rusted Coin](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Coin)

Before the fog gate go right to find three chests. The leftmost chest is a Mimic with the [Greatshield of Glory](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Greatshield+of+Glory). The chest next to it is also a Mimic, with [Rusted Gold Coin x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Gold+Coin). The right chest is real and contains an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)

Enter the boss room. If you are following Siegward's quest, a cutscene will show Siegward has come with you to help put his old friend to rest. Defeat [Yhorm the Giant](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Yhorm+the+Giant); receive [Cinders of a Lord](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Cinders+of+a+Lord) + [Soul of Yhorm the Giant](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+Yhorm+the+Giant). Speak to Siegward for a [Siegbräu](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Siegbrau)

Upon defeating Yhorm, you will probably be teleported to [Emma](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Emma) at the High Wall of Lothric (since this is the third Lord of Cinder). Speak with her to obtain the [Basin of Vows](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Basin+of+Vows). Approach the statue of a beheading knight to start the boss fight against the [Dancer of the Boreal Valley](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dancer+of+the+Boreal+Valley)

If Siegward helped you defeat Yhorm, return to Yhorm's boss room to find Siegward's [Storm Ruler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Storm+Ruler) + [Pierce Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pierce+Shield) as well as his [Catarina Armor Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Catarina+Set). If Yhorm is your second Lord of Cinder simply walk towards the flame on the outside and Siegward will die, dropping the items
Defeat the [Dancer of the Boreal Valley](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dancer+of+the+Boreal+Valley); receive [Soul of the Dancer](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+the+Dancer)
After defeating the Dancer of the Boreal Valley, you can place the basin and climb the ladder to access Lothric Castle
Take the first left to enter the Consumed King's Garden and pick up a [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)
Halfway down the elevator, jump off to a platform and then head down the stairs to find an [Estus Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Shard) on the right
From here go left and drop down to the stairs to find a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
The [Sage Ring+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sage+Ring) is on another set of broken stairs
To the right of the elevator structure is a [Ring of Sacrifice](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+Sacrifice)
The [Wood Grain Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Wood+Grain+Ring) is behind the elevator

Around where the slugs are you can find [Black Firebomb x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Firebomb), the [Claw](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Claw), the [Shadow Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shadow+Set), and a [Human Pine Resin](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Human+Pine+Resin)
Below the stairs on the left is a [Dark Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dark+Gem). Go up the stairs for a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
On the right side you can find [Human Pine Resin x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Human+Pine+Resin) and another [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)

On the right side of the garden is a door with an elevator. Go up and enter the next room to find a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) and a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk). Open the shortcut while you're here
Take the elevator back down and jump off at the halfway point to find the [Dragonscale Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragonscale+Ring)

You can summon [Hawkwood the Deserter](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hawkwood) for assistance if he has left Firelink Shrine. His summon sign is located on the large platform before the two knights
Kill the second greatsword-wielding knight outside the boss room to receive the [Magic Stoneplate Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Magic+Stoneplate+Ring)

Defeat [Oceiros, the Consumed King](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Oceiros,+the+Consumed+King); receive [Soul of Consumed Oceiros](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+Consumed+Oceiros)
After defeating Oceiros, continue on down and you'll find the Path of the Dragon gesture on a body

To the left of the gesture is a chest containing a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale). Further on is a second chest holding another [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale). Advance through the illusory wall behind this chest to enter the Untended Graves
From the bonfire go straight to find a [Shriving Stone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shriving+Stone)
Collect the [Ashen Estus Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ashen+Estus+Ring) located to the left from the bonfire
Pick up a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight) near the square centre
Near the left outer wall is a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
To the right is another [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
Kill the two Ravenous Crystal Lizards for four [Titanite Scales](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)
Where the first bonfire was in Cemetery of Ash, you'll be invaded by [Daughter of Crystal Kriemhild](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Daughter+of+Crystal+Kriemhild) if you're embered
Follow the path on the left for a [Hidden Blessing](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hidden+Blessing)
[Sword Master](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sword+Master) is available to be summoned outside the boss room
Defeat [Champion Gundyr](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Champion+Gundyr); receive [Soul of Champion Gundyr](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+Champion+Gundyr)
In the arena is also the [Black Knight Glaive](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Knight+Glaive)

At the very end of the Untended Graves when you reach the alternate version of Firelink Shrine, explore the graves for the [Hornet Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hornet+Ring) (on the right where Hawkwood's Shield was) and [Chaos Blade](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Chaos+Blade) (where Sword Master was)
Above the shrine entrance is a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)
Inside Firelink Shrine, you will discover the [Coiled Sword Fragment](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Coiled+Sword+Fragment) where the bonfire normally is
The [Life Ring+3](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Life+Ring) is behind Lothric's throne

There is another Shrine Handmaid here that sells the [Wolf Knight Armor Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Wolf+Knight+Set), the [Priestess Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Priestess+Ring), and other merchandise. Unlike the regular Handmaid, she will not respawn if killed, so be careful
Where Andre normally is, you will find the [Blacksmith Hammer](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blacksmith+Hammer)

Activate the illusory wall to where Irina normally is and you'll find the [Eyes of a Fire Keeper](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Eyes+of+a+Fire+Keeper). These can be given to the Fire Keeper to enable the End of Fire ending
If Yuria of Londor did not spawn in your game, you will find [Hollow's Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hollow's+Ashes) where Yoel would normally be
The [Ring of Steel Protection+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+Steel+Protection) is outside next to the tower
Return to the area in the Irithyll Dungeon with the dragon statue and perform the Path of the Dragon gesture to be teleported to Archdragon Peak
From where you spawn head to the tree for a [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)
At the top of the big rock farther on is a [Lightning Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Gem)
On the left cliff is [Homeward Bone x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone)
A [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk) is behind some rocks a bit farther on
Next to the bonfire is an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)

To the right of the structure in front of you is a [Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier) and to the left is a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)

On top of the structure is the [Ancient Dragon Greatshield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ancient+Dragon+Greatshield) and in the corner below is another [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
Follow the path to the left of the gate to obtain the [Lightning Clutch Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Clutch+Ring)
Defeat the [Ancient Wyvern](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ancient+Wyvern) boss and you'll receive the [Dragon Head Stone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragon+Head+Stone)
After defeating the Ancient Wyvern, you will be transported to the Dragon-Kin Mausoleum bonfire
Return to the entrance of the Ancient Wyvern boss area
In the middle of the arena is a [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)

Go to the right and pick up [Stalk Dung Pie x6](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Stalk+Dung+Pie), an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember), and another [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)
The railing is broken at the end, allowing you to walk along the edge. At the end of the path is the [Ring of Steel Protection](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+Steel+Protection)

Left of the arena middle is a [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier). Go up the stairs and left for [Lightning Urn x4](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Urn)
Continue down the normal path until you can go left into the dome building to find a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
Go down the ladder to find [Twinkling Titanite x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)
Go back to the normal path and on the edge of the platform is [Dung Pie x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dung+Pie)

Go up the stairs and get to the top of this building for [Titanite Chunk x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk) and [Lightning Bolt x12](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Bolt)
Head to the area where you did the plunging attack, but this time climb up the ladder on the other end for [Twinkling Titanite x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)

Kill the [Drakeblood Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Drakeblood+Knight) back at the Dragon-Kin Mausoleum to receive the [Drakeblood Greatsword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Drakeblood+Greatsword). After killing the Drakeblood Knight, return to the Oceiros, the Consumed King bonfire and run up to the altar where you got the Path of the Dragon gesture to find the [Drakeblood Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Drakeblood+Set) waiting for you there
Perform the Path of the Dragon gesture in front of the altar in the Dragon-Kin Mausoleum to receive the [Calamity Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Calamity+Ring)

Turn around at the altar and follow the path for a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) as well as another [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) further up
Entering the altar room you can find a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight) in the back left
On the right side of the top level is an exit to the exterior with a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) on a corpse
After going back in you can turn left to activate a shortcut
Examine the wooden gate to receive the [Dragonslayer Spear](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragonslayer+Spear)
Proceed down the stairs, follow the path, and climb the ladder near the scaffolding to receive the [Thunder Stoneplate Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Thunder+Stoneplate+Ring)

Go along the path until you come to a Crystal Lizard who drops [Twinkling Titanite x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite). The chest in the next room contains [Titanite Scale x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)
In the former room you can jump on the small stone altar to pick up the [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)

As you advance, you will encounter a Wyvern. You can kill this dragon safely by using arrows. Slaying it will reward you with [Titanite Chunk x6](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk) + [Titanite Scale x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) + [Twinkling Titanite x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite) and 50,000 souls

In the next building, you should encounter the [Rapier Champion](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rapier+Champion); slay him for [Ricard's Rapier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ricard's+Rapier). (It's also possible to get a [Havel Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Havel+Knight), who drops [Dragon Tooth](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragon+Tooth) + [Havel's Greatshield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Havel's+Greatshield))
In the following room, you will encounter a bell with a lever. Do not ring this bell until you are finished with this zone
Advance to discover the Great Belfry bonfire
If you go down the stairs you can find a [Large Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight) in the middle

If he moved on from Firelink Shrine, you can summon [Hawkwood the Deserter](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hawkwood) at the bottom of the stairs outside the the Great Belfry bonfire. He will assist you to get to the top of the stairway with loads of enemies in the path. Use the Path of the Dragon gesture at the altar at the very top of the stairway (Hawkwood will show you where) and you'll get the [Twinkling Dragon Torso Stone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Dragon+Torso+Stone)
On the way up the hill to get the Twinkling Dragon Torso Stone, you will find the [Dragon Chaser's Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragon+Chaser's+Ashes) off to the left side
[Havel's Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Havel's+Ring) is in a corner behind the structure halfway up the hill
Go down the hill and through the structure on the left to end up at a ladder. Next to the ladder is a chest with [Twinkling Titanite x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)

Climb the ladder to discover [Havel](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Havel+Knight) standing in front of a dead dragon. Kill him for [Dragon Tooth](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragon+Tooth) + [Havel's Greatshield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Havel's+Greatshield). Next to the dragon is a [Titanite Slab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Slab)
To the left of Havel, you can drop down a ledge to find the [Great Magic Barrier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Great+Magic+Barrier) miracle

After defeating Havel, you can find [Havel's Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Havel's+Set) near the [Stray Demon](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Stray+Demon) above the Old Wolf of Farron

Head back to Firelink Shrine and talk to Andre. He'll give you a message from Hawkwood asking you to come to the Abyss Watchers bonfire to settle things. Head there and battle [Hawkwood](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hawkwood). If you win, you gain the [Twinkling Dragon Head Stone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Dragon+Head+Stone). If you lose, Hawkwood takes your [Twinkling Dragon Torso Stone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Dragon+Torso+Stone). You can battle him as many times as you like until you beat him
Ring the bell to unlock the next boss battle
Defeat the [Nameless King](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Nameless+King); receive [Soul of the Nameless King](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+the+Nameless+King)
After killing the Nameless King turn around and pick up the [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) from the corpse in the other room

On the path towards the mausoleum you'll find a [Titanite Slab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Slab) and farther on the [Dragonslayer Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragonslayer+Set)
The [Covetous Gold Serpent Ring+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Covetous+Gold+Serpent+Ring) is on one of the side stairways

[Greirat](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Greirat+of+the+Undead+Settlement) will request to pillage Lothric Castle. If you allow him, he will die on this trip as there is no method to saving him. His corpse with [Greirat's Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Greirat's+ashes) will be found later in the Grand Archives, enabling all of his wares at the Shrine Handmaiden and unlocking [Lightning Urn](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Urn), [Splintering Bolt](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Splintering+Bolt), and [Exploding Bolt](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Exploding+Bolt). If you send him out, talk to [Unbreakable Patches](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Unbreakable+Patches), as he will ask where Greirat goes. He will then leave and come back later with a hidden blessing after you defeat a boss
Advance past the three Lothric Knights to the Lothric Castle bonfire, picking up the [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight) along the way
In the next room, you will find the [Prayer Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Prayer+Set) in a chest
On the railing to the left is a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)

Continue outside and enter the room on the right. There will be a Winged Knight with twinaxes and a [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite) behind the ladder. Climb the ladder and there will be an illusionary wall to a room with the [Winged Knight Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Winged+Knight+Set) and [Sacred Bloom Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sacred+Bloom+Shield)
Go outside again and at the fork go left for a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
Go up the right stairs, down, and left for a [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)
On the other side is [Titanite Chunk x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
Get back to the main path and in the next area you will find the Dragon Barracks bonfire
In a corner by the bonfire is an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)
Head up the stairs to the left to find a Lothric Knight and a corpse containing the [Greatlance](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Greatlance)

Starting at the Dragon Barracks bonfire, go up the stairs and to the bridge where the two [Lothric Wyverns](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lothric+Wyvern) are. You can kill a wyvern using a bow, causing the second to die as well. Additionally, you can target the [Pus of Man](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pus+of+Man) at the wyvern's feet, this will cause the Lothric Wyverns to despawn. Alternatively, you can kill these mobs with melee later
Run almost all the way across the bridge and drop off at the end. An [Undead Bone Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Undead+Bone+Shard) is underneath the bridge

Drop down and pick up [Twinkling Titanite x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite) (on the left side), a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk), and another [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
Break the barrels and boxes in the next room to reveal [Lightning Urn x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Urn)

Kill the Crystal Lizard outside for [Twinkling Titanite x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite). (Note: If you kill this lizard and then die or reload before killing the second one in this area, that one will disappear permanently)
Farther and on the right is a [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier)

Go up the small stairs, kill the Winged Knight, and pick up [Sniper Crossbow](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sniper+Crossbow) + [Sniper Bolt x11](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sniper+Bolt) behind him
Circle back to the bridge and drop down at the near end and for a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)

Continue left until you can enter a room with a [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier) and a [Raw Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Raw+Gem)

Go downstairs to encounter a [Boreal Outrider Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Boreal+Outrider+Knight) in a cellar. After killing it, you will receive the [Irithyll Rapier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Irithyll+Rapier). In this room you will also find four chests containing [Twinkling Titanite x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite), a single [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite), a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale), and the [Spirit Tree Crest Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Spirit+Tree+Crest+Shield)

Take the path right across where the wyverns would spit fire and on the left in the next room is [Black Firebomb x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Firebomb). Go up the ladder and on the edge is a [Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier)
Kill the Pus of Man for [Titanite Chunk x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk) + [Ember x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)

Turn around and take the exit on the same level to find a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk), a Crystal Lizard who drops [Twinkling Titanite x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite), and a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) at the end. (Note: If you have died or reloaded since killing the first lizard in this area, the second one will have disappeared permanently)
The [Life Ring+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Life+Ring) is on a ledge below the Titanite Chunk

Now that the wyverns are dead you can pick up these items here in peace: [Lightning Urn x6](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Urn), a [Refined Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Refined+Gem), an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember), and another [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)

Enter the room with the ladder again, go up the stairs, and at the top you'll find a Mimic with [Titanite Scale x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale). Next to it is a [Pale Pine Resin](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pale+Pine+Resin)
Exit to the right for another [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)
Continue to the next room for a lever. Pull this lever to open the gate underneath the wyverns
On the edge you can find a [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)
An [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) can be found left of the stairs leading up
After clearing your way to the roof, you will encounter the entrance to the Dragonslayer Armour boss fight. Opposing this entrance, you will find a shortcut elevator to the entrance of Lothric Castle
Next to the shortcut is also a [Sunlight Medal](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sunlight+Medal)

Facing away from the Dragonslayer Armour bossfight entrance, a doorway lit by torches is to the left. Proceed through the door and up the stairs. On the right is [Rusted Coin x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Coin) as well as a chest with a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)

Turn around and exit using the door you can see. You will find the [Red Tearstone Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Red+Tearstone+Ring) on a body to the right. Drop off the ledge to find [Caitha's Chime](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Caitha's+Chime)
The [Thunder Stoneplate Ring+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Thunder+Stoneplate+Ring) is at the back end of the roof slightly above the chime

Facing away from the Dragonslayer Armour bossfight entrance, head to the right and drop off the ledge to kill the [Pus of Man](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pus+of+Man) for [Titanite Chunk x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk) + [Ember x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember). Next to it is a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)

Inside the building, you will find a Mimic chest containing the [Sunlight Straight Sword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sunlight+Straight+Sword). In the same room, you will find a corpse with the [Braille Divine Tome of Lothric](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Braille+Divine+Tome+of+Lothric)
The [Dark Stoneplate Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dark+Stoneplate+Ring) is outside on the balcony

Facing away from the Dragonslayer Armour bossfight entrance, head to the right and use the ladder on the building to climb up it. You can find a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk) on the side facing the fog door
Head over the roofs to the windows of an opposite building. Climb down the ladder and you will find the [Knight's Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Knight's+Ring)

Continue across the bridge to reach the Altar of Sunlight. Pray at it to receive the Praise the Sun gesture and offer [Sunlight Medals](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sunlight+Medal) for the [Warrior of Sunlight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Warrior+of+Sunlight) covenant. The chest contains [Titanite Scale x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale). Open the door revealing a shortcut back to the Dragonslayer Armour area

[Eygon of Carim](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Eygon+of+Carim) can be summoned for the Dragonslayer Armour fight if you have not purchased any dark miracles from Irina and talked to him in Firelink Shrine so he disappears from there. His summon sign will be available in the chapel to the right of the boss area
[Sirris](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sirris+of+the+Sunless+Realms) can be summoned for this fight if you are friendly. Her summon sign is below the second set of stairs
Defeat the [Dragonslayer Armour](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragonslayer+Armour); receive [Soul of Dragonslayer Armour](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+Dragonslayer+Armour)

If [Eygon of Carim](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Eygon+of+Carim) has left Firelink Shrine, his dead body can now be found in Irina's original cell in the Undead Settlement, containing [Morne's Great Hammer](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Morne's+Great+Hammer) + [Moaning Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Moaning+Shield). You can then purchase [Morne's Armor Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Morne's+Set) from the Shrine Handmaid
There are two ends to Irina's side quest depending on your actions. (Note: If option B didn't happen yet check back after the Twin Princes fight)

Irina A: By giving her just the [Braille Divine Tome of Carim](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Braille+Divine+Tome+of+Carim) and [Braille Divine Tome of Lothric](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Braille+Divine+Tome+of+Lothric), or by giving her all 4 Tomes, but not buying any dark miracles, you can make Irina a Fire Keeper. Just buy all her standard spells, plus Med Heal, Tears of Denial, Force, Bountiful Light, Blessed Weapon, and Magic Barrier. (If you want the Saint's Ring, be sure to purchase it now, as she will no longer offer it later.) She'll move to the bottom of the tower to the left of Firelink Shrine after you refresh the world and will now act as a Fire Keeper. If you did give her the Londor and Deep Tome instead of Karla, they will be on the ground beside her and you can now give them to Karla

Irina B: If you gave Irina the [Londor Braille Divine Tome](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Londor+Braille+Divine+Tome) or [Deep Braille Divine Tome](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Deep+Braille+Divine+Tome) and bought ANY of these spells (Deep Protection, Gnaw, Dark Blade, Vow of Silence, or Dead Again), she will have disappeared for you sometime in the game from her normal location in Firelink Shrine. She would then be outside near the Iudex Gundyr fight area with Eygon. Eygon will believe you have killed her and is hostile. Upon killing him, you see that Irina is still actually alive, but the corruption has begun for her. This is an alternate way of Morne's Armor Set being available for purchase. After Irina returns to Firelink Shrine, buying all the dark miracles listed above will fully corrupt her and she'll no longer act as a vendor to you. Equipping Morne's Gauntlets allows her to believe you to be Eygon and she'll ask to be killed. Do so and you can give her ashes to the Shrine Handmaid to sell her miracles
From the Dragonslayer Armour bonfire, facing the Grand Archives go right downstairs to find a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)

In the first area, you will find the Grand Archives bonfire with [Black Hand Gotthard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Hand+Gotthard)'s corpse nearby, containing [Grand Archives Key](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Grand+Archives+Key) + [Gotthard Twinswords](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Gotthard+Twinswords). (Note: This body will only appear once three Lords of Cinder, namely the Abyss Watchers, Aldrich, and Yhorm, have fallen)
Once inside the Grand Archives, you will notice a Crystal Sage. Killing him will give you the [Crystal Scroll](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Scroll)

If you have given [Orbeck of Vinheim](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Orbeck+of+Vinheim) all four scrolls and bought every spell he offers, he will tell you he is departing. You'll now be able to summon him for the Twin Princes fight

On the left side of the archives is a Crystal Lizard who drops [Crystal Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Gem) + [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)
From the lizard go right, then take the first left for a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)
Now go up the stairs and right to find a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
You will encounter an altar with four Scholars. After killing them, you can dunk your head in wax which will temporarily prevent the curse hands from harming you
Nearby you will find a Lothric Knight. In the room following him you will find the [Crystal Chime](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Chime)

Go back outside. On the left is a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk). Then drop down for another [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
When standing before the altar turn around and on the right you'll see a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) on the bookcases
