Advance into the dark room, which has two Crystal Lizards who drop [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite) + [Chaos Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Chaos+Gem) and [Twinkling Titanite x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite) as well as a corpse with a [Soul of a Nameless Soldier](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Nameless+Soldier)

Against the wall you will find a lever which will unlock a room containing [Witch's Locks](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Witch's+Locks) and [Power Within](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Power+Within)
On the top level of the dark room is a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)
Leave the dark room and you will encounter a ladder which you can kick down to open a shortcut to the bottom floor
Take a right before the ladder to find a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
On the left is a Crystal Lizard who drops [Twinkling Titanite x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)
The lever in the middle between the bookcases will unlock a room near the first wax altar containing a Titanite Slab
Go outside to find [Homeward Bone x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone)
Inside and up the left stairs is another wax altar and a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)

Near the broken railing where a single Scholar is standing, drop down onto the bookshelf below to find a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) and then roll off these onto bookshelves even farther below for the [Avelyn](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Avelyn)

Return to the first wax altar, turn around, and on the back right is now a path that was revealed by pulling the second lever. Grab the [Titanite Slab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Slab) in the chest
Go back to the upper level and continue along. After ending up at the top, go left, and in a corner is a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)

On the same level is a wall in the back left with gates. Hit it to reveal a room with a [Boreal Outrider Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Boreal+Outrider+Knight). Defeat it for the [Outrider Knight Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Outrider+Knight+Set). Exit through the back for the [Soul Stream](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+Stream) sorcery
Exit the illusory wall room, turn left, and next to the ladder in a corner is a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)
Climb down the ladder and you'll see a [Shriving Stone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shriving+Stone) by the railing
Before crossing the bridge, pull the lever to the right to open a passage containing the [Scholar Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Scholar+Ring)
Cross the bridge and take the elevator to the ground floor. Pull the lever to reveal a shortcut that returns you to the entrance

If you intend to send [Greirat of the Undead Settlement](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Greirat+of+the+Undead+Settlement) on his final journey, this is a good time to do so. You will be able to pick up his ashes soon

Returning to the bridge, there is a broken railing on the right. Drop down to find a Crystal Lizard with [Titanite Scale x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale). Use the elevator shortcut to return and then proceed upstairs

In the back of the room with the four Archive Scholars is a [Large Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight). In the chest to the left of the exit is [Titanite Scale x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)

In the next room is a Crystal Lizard with [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite) + [Refined Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Refined+Gem). The [Fleshbite Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Fleshbite+Ring) will be to the right of it
On a rooftop with a landing is a wall with some broken segments and a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
Continue along the rooftops and go up the left for a [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)

On the big roof to the left are two Crystal Lizards who drop [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite) + [Heavy Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Heavy+Gem) and [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite) + [Sharp Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sharp+Gem)

Drop to the lower platform with the Corvians and go into the small room to the right for a [Hollow Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hollow+Gem). Go outside and to the right for a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)

Go past where the Corvians were and jump to the lower platform for [Titanite Scale x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) and [Greirat Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Greirat's+Ashes) if you sent him out to scavenge

Go back to the roof where the two Crystal Lizards were and stick to the right wall. After dropping down to another roof you will find a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)

Continue sticking to the right wall until you get to a broken window you can enter. Inside you'll find the last [Undead Bone Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Undead+Bone+Shard) and an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember). You can also kick down the ladder here for a shortcut
Go all the way to the other side of the archives for [Titanite Chunk x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk) on a corpse out on the balcony

On the path you probably noticed a door. Step outside and you will encounter three NPCs: [Black Hand Kamui](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Hand+Kamui), [Daughter of Crystal Kriemhild](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Daughter+of+Crystal+Kriemhild), and [Lion Knight Albert](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lion+Knight+Albert). Killing them will reward you with [Onikiri and Ubadachi](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Onikiri+and+Ubadachi), the [Sage's Crystal Staff](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sage's+Crystal+Staff), and the [Golden Wing Crest Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Golden+Wing+Crest+Shield), respectively
On the stairs is a [Large Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)
Continue up the stairs and you will find an elevator shortcut to the Grand Archives bonfire

At the very top of the Grand Archives, you will see a series of barricades leading to the Twin Princes fight. Turn around and go up the stairs. On the railing around the left is a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)
Go up the other roof where the three Gertrude's Knights are. You'll find the last [Estus Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Estus+Shard) on the very back of this roof
Killing all the knights on the roof awards you a [Titanite Slab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Slab), but only once
At the top of the tower you will find the [Hunter's Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hunter's+Ring)
The [Lingering Dragoncrest Ring+2](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lingering+Dragoncrest+Ring) is in an alcove on the side opposite the ladder
Enter the lower entrance to the building and drop into the cage to receive the [Divine Pillars of Light](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Divine+Pillars+of+Light) miracle
Exit the cage and on the rafters is a [Blessed Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blessed+Gem)
The [Sage Ring+1](https://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sage+Ring) is on the lower rafters

Drop down to the stone rafters and climb down the ladder on the side with the Man-grub. Down here are two chests containing a [Divine Blessing](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Divine+Blessing) and [Twinkling Titanite x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)
Return to the barricades and fight your way to the top. You will find an elevator shortcut leading to Lothric Castle's Dragonslayer Armour courtyard
This elevator has a second elevator underneath it. Send the elevator up and take the second elevator down to claim a [Titanite Slab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Slab)

[Orbeck of Vinheim](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Orbeck+of+Vinheim) will be available to be summoned near the large metal door if you gave him all four sorcery scrolls and purchased all available spells
[Sirris](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sirris+of+the+Sunless+Realms) will be available to be summoned at the fog door if you are on friendly terms

Defeat the [Twin Princes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lothric,+Younger+Prince); receive [Cinders of a Lord](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Cinders+of+a+Lord) + [Soul of the Twin Princes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+the+Twin+Princes)

After beating the Twin Princes, you can find [Orbeck's Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Orbeck's+Ashes) on his body in the Grand Archives if he departed from your Firelink Shrine after you bought all his spells. His corpse will be in a chair up the shortcut elevator inside the archives, on the large wooden balcony just before the stairs that lead to the outside. If Yuria assigned you to assassinate Orbeck, give his ashes to her in exchange for the [Morion Blade](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Morion+Blade). This also adds Orbeck's [Clandestine Coat](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Clandestine+Coat) to the Shrine Handmaid's inventory

Return to Sirris' grandfather's grave in Firelink Shrine after the Twin Princes fight and you'll find her body with the [Sunless Talisman](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sunless+Talisman) on it. You can also now buy Sirris' [Sunless Armor Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sunless+Set) from the Shrine Handmaid

With Sirris' side quest complete, you are now free to finally continue [Leonhard's](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Leonhard). Head to the Rosaria's Bed Chamber bonfire (you might find a Man-grub in here which drops [Heysel Pick](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Heysel+Pick) + [Xanthous Crown](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Xanthous+Crown)) and give her a Pale Tongue. Leonhard should now appear in this room. If not, refresh the world. Exhaust his dialogue, refresh the world again and Rosaria will now be dead with a [Black Eye Orb](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Eye+Orb) on her body

Head to the Aldrich, Devourer of Gods bonfire and take either of the lifts in the room up. The [Black Eye Orb](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Eye+Orb) will react to this room. Use it and you'll invade Leonhard's world. Kill him for [Soul of Rosaria](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+Rosaria) + [Crescent Moon Sword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crescent+Moon+Sword) + [Silver Mask](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Silver+Mask). You can also now buy [Leonhard's Armor Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Leonhard's+Set) from the Shrine Handmaid. You can give the [Soul of Rosaria](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+Rosaria) to Ludleth for the [Bountiful Sunlight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Bountiful+Sunlight) miracle. There is no benefit to restoring Rosaria using her soul, as her being dead does not prevent you from offering pale tongues, redistributing attributes, or changing appearance
Put all the Cinders of Lords back on their thrones if you haven't already and then interact with the Firelink Shrine bonfire to be teleported to the Kiln of the First Flame

After being teleported, you will find the Flameless Shrine bonfire. As you exit the building, you will find the Kiln of the First Flame. If you return to Firelink Shrine, you will discover the [Skull Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Skull+Ring) on Ludleth's throne

If you have 8 Dark Sigils, you can summon [Yuria of Londor](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Yuria+of+Londor) and [Londor Pale Shade](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Londor+Pale+Shade) for the Soul of Cinder fight. If Yuria survives, you will be able to pick up [Darkdrift](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Darkdrift) + [Black Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Set) at her usual location in Firelink Shrine
Defeat the [Soul of Cinder](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+Cinder); receive [Soul of the Lords](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+the+Lords)
Ending Guide: Depending on what you've done up to this point, [you will have certain options for the endings you can select](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Endings)

Ending 1: If you did not follow the Yoel/Yuria quest line, simply interacting with the First Flame results in the standard "To Link the First Flame" ending. You will receive the [To Link the First Flame](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Trophy+&+Achievement+Guide) achievement (Note: If you did follow the quest line and still want Ending 1, let the Fire Keeper heal the Dark Sigil first)

Ending 2: If you obtained the Eyes of a Fire Keeper from the Untended Graves area and gave them to the Fire Keeper, you can use a summon sign next to the bonfire to trigger the "The End of Fire" ending. You will receive the [The End of Fire](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Trophy+&+Achievement+Guide) achievement

Ending 3: If you follow the steps to Ending 2, you have a short window where you regain control of your character during the final scene. You can attack the Fire Keeper after the cutscene for a different conclusion, often called the "Unkindled Ending". (Note: There is no achievement for this ending)

Ending 4: If you followed the Yoel/Yuria quest line to this point and have all 8 Dark Sigils (5 from Yoel and 3 from "marrying" Anri), interacting with the First Flame will wrest it from its mantle, triggering the "The Usurpation of Fire" ending. You will receive the [The Usurpation of Fire](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Trophy+&+Achievement+Guide) achievement

To access the DLC area go to the Cleansing Chapel bonfire to find Slave Knight Gael next to the altar. Talk to him and accept his offer to be transported to the Painted World of Ariandel. (Note: If you have already progressed into The Ringed City, Gael will be gone. To enter the Painted World you can instead touch the scrap of a painting, located under a small candelabrum on the right side of the altar)
Upon arriving, you'll find [Rime-blue Moss Clump x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rime-blue+Moss+Clump) to your left
Exit the cave to find the first bonfire
From the bonfire stick to the left wall until you see a [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler) next to a hill in the center
Continue along the left wall until you get to a fly and a [Poison Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Poison+Gem)
Stick to the wall again and follow it until the snow platform breaks. On a corpse is a [Rime-blue Moss Clump](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rime-blue+Moss+Clump)

Go along the right wall, past a lone wolf, and up the hill to find a [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler) and the [Follower Javelin](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Follower+Javelin) a bit farther up
Go back to where you dropped off and in the middle of the forest, next to a tree, is a [Rusted Coin](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Coin)

Continue going straight towards the cliff and the Gravetender Greatwolf should attack you. At around 50% he disappears and leaves you with [Large Titanite Shard x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
Around where the wolf first notices you is a corpse with a [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler)
Under the big rock, where the wolf was on, is a tree with another [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler) next to it
From here follow the cliff and on the part where it juts out is [Homeward Bone x6](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone)
Go towards the tower and with your back to it you can see a [Heavy Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Heavy+Gem) in the corner of one of the structures
Enter the tower. (Note: It might help if you equip the Silvercat Ring for the tower section)
On the ground floor is a [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior)
After climbing up the ladder go down the stairs to find the [Ethereal Oak Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ethereal+Oak+Shield)
On the next set of stairs is a Crystal Lizard with a [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)

Now go to the top floor and climb up the ladder on the outside to find a [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior) as well as the [Captain's Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Captain's+Ashes) on the rafters. Giving these ashes to the Handmaiden enables you to buy three [Refined Gems](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Refined+Gem), the [Millwood Knight Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Millwood+Set), and [Millwood Greatarrows](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Millwood+Greatarrow)
From the rafters drop down to the corpse to get the [Millwood Battle Axe](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Millwood+Battle+Axe)
Exit the tower and go around it on the right to find a [Blessed Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blessed+Gem)
With your back to the tower entrance head straight towards the hill with the trees

Go up the hill and left to find [Millwood Greatbow](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Millwood+Greatbow) + [Millwood Greatarrow x5](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Millwood+Greatarrow) next to some Millwood Knights
Now take the other available way from the tower

Upon going up the hill you will be attacked by the Gravetender Greatwolf plus some normal wolves. The wolf again drops [Large Titanite Shard x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)

Continue this way and the snow will break again. Drop down the ledges and on the last one is a [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler)

Go left from here and pick up [Black Firebomb x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Firebomb) up the hill. In the maggot pit is the [Frozen Weapon](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Frozen+Weapon) sorcery
Go up to the trees and pick up the [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) on the left wall
Now go back to where you dropped off after defeating the wolf and go right to find the Rope Bridge Cave bonfire
Cross the bridge and pick up a [Hollow Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hollow+Gem) to the right of the entrance to the chapel
Talk to [Sir Vilhelm](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sir+Vilhelm), open the door, and light the Ariandel Chapel bonfire
Talk to Friede two times to gain the [Chillbite Ring](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Chillbite+Ring)

Go back outside, destroy the bridge to create a ladder, and climb it down. At the bottom you can find [Rime-blue Moss Clump x4](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rime-blue+Moss+Clump) on a corpse on the right wall
Drop down to the roots and go along until you find a Crystal Lizard who drops [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)
Stick to the right wall to find an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)
On one of the lower roots you can find the [Follower Sabre](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Follower+Sabre) near the cliff
After reaching the frozen lake you can activate the bonfire and rest at it

In the lake you can see a frozen Giant Crab. Upon approaching it another one will come out of the lake. Killing both of them rewards you with a [Crystal Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Gem)
Take the path behind the crab to find [Homeward Bone x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone) up a small hill
Continue along this path to find a mad tree who guards the [Snap Freeze](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Snap+Freeze) sorcery

Killing the mad tree also reveals a big ladder on the small hill where the Homeward Bones were. Climb it and the one after that to get to a [Titanite Slab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Slab)
Continue further and drop down to find a [Shriving Stone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shriving+Stone) next to some flies

Ignore the ladder up (it leads to the Rope Bridge Cave bonfire) and keep going forward to find a Crystal Lizard who drops a [Large Titanite Shard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
Continue this way and after sliding down the hill go right. Next to the cliff is a [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler)
From where you slid down take the left path, drop down the ledges, and pick up [Budding Green Blossom x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Budding+Green+Blossom) on the far side
Enter the Corvian Settlement and take the right path to find a [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler)
After climbing up the ladder and entering the house pick up an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember). There is a Corvian NPC who you can talk to in the kitchen
Exit the house and enter the one on the left to find the Corvian Settlement bonfire
Enter the leftmost house on the other side of the bridge to find an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)

Exit the house, go right, and drop off on the right side of the bridge to find a [Simple Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Simple+Gem). Open up the gate here if you want and return to the bonfire

Go back to the bridge, cross it, and go up the left side. A bit farther on you can jump from one side to the other to find a [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler) in a broken wall
Enter the broken structure overlooking the entrance and go left along the wall to find a Crystal Lizard who drops [Large Titanite Shard x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard)
Go back to the broken structure and jump towards the [Crow Quills](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crow+Quills) on the rock

Enter the settlement again and from the bonfire go to the cemetery gate at the far back and drop down at the cliff. Enter the house with the flies to find a [Dark Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dark+Gem)
Continue along the cliff until you find a [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler)
Climb up the ladder, drop down to the bridge, and open the door on the ground floor of the house
Cross the bridge and pick up the [Large Soul of an Unknown Traveler](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+an+Unknown+Traveler) on the roof
Enter the house with the Corvians on top and follow the path up to the roof to find the [Crow Talons](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crow+Talons)
Climb the ladder on the other house again, enter the tower, and drop down to find the [Slave Knight Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Slave+Set)
Enter the tower via the roof again, climb up the ladder, and from the bridge drop down to the right roof below to find [Rusted Gold Coin x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Gold+Coin)

Now return to the tower and climb up the ladder once more, cross the bridge, and on the other bridge is a Crystal Lizard who drops a [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)
Go onto the roof of the church to find a [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior) on a corpse at the tower
Use the back right window of the church to drop down to the rafters and find a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)
The corpse in front of the altar has the [Way of White Corona](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Way+of+White+Corona) miracle
Exit the church and open the cemetery gate

Instead of entering the library take a right and pick up the [Young White Branch](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Young+White+Branch) next to the living tree. Farther in the back is [Rusted Coin x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Coin)

Defeat [Sir Vilhelm](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sir+Vilhelm) in the library to gain [Contraption Key](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Contraption+Key) + [Onyx Blade](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Onyx+Blade)
Activate the lever, go to the second floor, talk to the NPC, and exit to the balcony. Go around the structure to find the bonfire and open the gate
From the bonfire take the path into the forest and stick to the left wall to find [Prism Stone x10](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Prism+Stone) on a corpse

Pass the tree, walk towards the cliff, and go right from here. Go up the hill, sticking to the cliff, and drop down in the back left to find the [Follower Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Follower+Shield)
Go around, take the first right, go straight, looking at the tower, and pick up an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) in a small cave on the right
From the cave continue towards the tower until you get to the cliff. There is a corpse on the right with a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)

Turn around, take the first right, and go past the bell while sticking to the right. After taking a right you should see a big tree with a red base. Interact with it to fell it and create a shortcut to an elevator
Cross the tree as well as the bridge and on the left is another tree bridge that leads to a platform with another [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)

Take the same way back to the bell and follow the path up the hill. Take a left and go straight until you meet some wolves as well as [Large Titanite Shard x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard) around the corner to the left
From here take the lower path to find the [Follower Torch](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Follower+Torch)

Head back up the hill and take the lower path. Use the Silvercat Ring to jump down to the frozen lake. If you don't have the Silvercat Ring go back to the bell and go up the hill towards the cliff. You can drop down with a snow platform here
Enter the cave right where you jumped down to find the [Earth Seeker](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Earth+Seeker)

Around the lake itself you can find a [Large Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight), a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight), and another [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)
After exiting the lake area follow the path along the cliff, go back to the wolves, and go even farther up the hill
Take a left and follow the short path to an enemy and the [Quakestone Hammer](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Quakestone+Hammer)
Take the other path, drop down a ledge to find [Large Titanite Shard x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Titanite+Shard), fell the tree to create a shortcut, and enter the tunnel
In the room with the flies pick up [Dung Pie x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dung+Pie) from the rafter, exit the room by going up, and open the shortcut door to the bonfire
Go back to the room with the flies and drop down to the lower floor
Here you can find a [Blood Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blood+Gem) and [Vilhelm's Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Vilhelm's+Set)
If you take the stairs up you can find an illusory wall on the right that leads directly to the room on the upper floor

From where the Blood Gem was look towards the entrance on the upper floor and walk towards the pillar with some planks and stones next to it. Activate the handle to reveal a secret passage next to the bonfire

When looking at the handle turn left and walk straight towards the wall. Walk right until you see some small steps (you should also hear the sound of a Crystal Lizard). Hit the bricks to reveal an illusory wall
In this room are two Crystal Lizards who both drop a [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)

Go outside, drop down to the roots, and follow them to the platform on the tower to find [Pyromancer's Parting Flame](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Pyromancer's+Parting+Flame) + [Homeward Bone x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone)
Towards the center of the tower you'll be invaded by Livid Pyromancer Dunnel if you're embered. He drops the [Floating Chaos](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Floating+Chaos) pyromancy
You'll have to use a Homeward Bone to leave this place. Warp to the Depths of the Painting bonfire and from here take the way right that leads to the tower
Defeat [Champion's Gravetender & Gravetender Greatwolf](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Champion's+Gravetender+&+Gravetender+Greatwolf)
Killing this boss gives you [Champion's Bones](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Champion's+Bones) + [Valorheart](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Valorheart)
Go back to the Ariandel Chapel bonfire
For the following boss you can summon [Slave Knight Gael](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Slave+Knight+Gael)
Defeat [Sister Friede](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sister+Friede); receive [Soul of Sister Friede](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+Sister+Friede)
During the fight you also gained a [Titanite Slab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Slab)

Travel back to the Corvian Settlement and go to the NPC in the house next to the bonfire. He is in the back where you climbed up the ladder. For defeating the boss you get a [Titanite Slab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Slab) from him. If you have killed this NPC before for some reason the slab will be in the kitchen

To access the DLC area go to the Kiln of the First Flame bonfire or the Sister Friede bonfire. Next to either you'll find another bonfire that sends you to The Dreg Heap. You will find an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) to your right around a round rooftop

After taking the plunge go on the platform and take a left, up the set of stairs, and pick up the [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk). Take the other stairs further up to get the [Aquamarine Dagger](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Aquamarine+Dagger)

Go back to the platform and go towards the item you can see. The floor will break and you will end up in a room with [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior), [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale), [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite), and the [Murky Hand Scythe](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Murky+Hand+Scythe) (to the left of the exit, behind the bookshelves)

After taking another plunge go towards the church and pick up [Lightning Urn x4](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Urn). To the left is a wooden platform, remember it but ignore it for now, we'll come back here when the Angel is dead
Inside the church you will find a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)
After exiting the church go right and you will find [Rusted Coin x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rusted+Coin) next to the fountain
Enter the house and you will find a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk). Further in is the [Murky Longstaff](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Murky+Longstaff)

After picking up the staff hit the illusory wall on the left (when entering the room) to reveal some stairs. Go up and in the back left corner of the second room is an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)
Continue along this path, kick down the ladder on the left, and find the [Great Soul Dregs](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Great+Soul+Dregs) sorcery at the far end of the room
Go out on the wooden balcony and fall down at the far end to find the [Covetous Silver Serpent Ring+3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Covetous+Silver+Serpent+Ring)

Go back to the church and take a left. A tower will collapse into the church. Continue just a bit further to find and kill the first Angel Summoner for [Twinkling Titanite x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)
Now take the new path thanks to the collapsed tower in the church to find [Lapp](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lapp). Exhaust his dialogue

Proceed further and you will see two possible places where you can drop. Ignore the one to the right and instead drop down on a Harald Knight with a plunging attack. Collect a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk) and [Homeward Bone x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone)
Take the plunge to the Earthen Peak Ruins bonfire. If you have died since meeting Lapp, you will find him to the right on a cliff. If not go to Firelink Shrine and then back to reset the zone

Return to the first bonfire and run all the way to where the first Angel was (near the Lightning Urns). Behind where you dropped down is a [Divine Blessing](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Divine+Blessing). Go to the wooden platform and collect the [Ring of Steel Protection+3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+Steel+Protection)

Return to where you first met Lapp, and this time drop down on the right into a bed of ash. On the upper platform you will find [Projected Heal](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Projected+Heal) in a small alcove

From the miracle go left and drop further down to where the Lothric Knights are to find a [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior) and further in the [Lothric War Banner](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lothric+War+Banner)
Consider killing the two Angel Summoners before looking for the items in the ruins. Each of them drops [Twinkling Titanite x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)
Next to the windmill blades is [Black Firebomb x4](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Firebomb)
In front of the windmill, closer to the cliff edge, is a corpse with a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
Go towards the wooden hut on the cliff's edge to find the [Desert Pyromancer Garb](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Desert+Pyromancer+Garb)
Continue to the next hut to find [Titanite Chunk x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
Turn around and you'll see a cliff that juts out with the [Giant Door Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Giant+Door+Shield) at the end

From the bonfire you can see an item on a root. In order to get to it you have to cross the tower to the left of it, turn right, and run towards the back and onto the roots to get the [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)
Go to the entrance corridor of the swamp, the one with the two Thralls, and stick to the left to find an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)
Go back out and cross the first collapsed tower on the left to find a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) in the second one. Drop down to enter the swamp
Turn around and take the path below the tower to find the [Desert Pyromancer Gloves](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Desert+Pyromancer+Gloves)
To the left of the gloves, in the swamp, is the [Desert Pyromancer Skirt](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Desert+Pyromancer+Skirt)
In the broken hut at the edge of the swamp is [Purple Moss Clump x4](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Purple+Moss+Clump)

Go onto the giant root next to the hut and at the end find the [Ring of Favor+3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+Favor). Turn back and drop down to the lower root to find a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)

Drop down into the swamp and enter the cave to find a [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior) and a [Titanite Slab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Slab). If you have died or reloaded at least three times since talking to Lapp at the Earthen Peak Ruins bonfire, he will have gotten the Slab for you and will give it to you after talking to him. If you retrieve the Slab yourself, Lapp will give you a [Siegbräu](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Siegbr%C3%A4u) the next time you talk to him

Exit the cave and get the [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior) from the middle of the swamp and the [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk) at the houses
Go right towards the island to find the [Loincloth](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Loincloth)

Stick to the left side, going past the buildings, to find the [Harald Curved Greatsword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Harald+Curved+Greatsword) and a [Homeward Bone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Homeward+Bone)
Follow the roots all the way up to the roof to find and dispatch the Angel Summoner
Drop down here, go up the root, and switch to the other one to find a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
Now go up the roots to find [Desert Pyromancer Zoey](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Desert+Pyromancer+Zoey) at the top. She drops [Flame Fan](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Flame+Fan)
On this path you can find [Prism Stone x6](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Prism+Stone) and the [Desert Pyromancer Hood](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Desert+Pyromancer+Hood)
After following the roots and dropping down to the tower get onto the roofs on the right to find a [Divine Blessing](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Divine+Blessing)
Follow the roots down to where the Angel Summoner is to find an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)
Go to where you first dropped down and light the Within the Earthen Peak Ruins bonfire

For the next boss you can summon both [Slave Knight Gael](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Slave+Knight+Gael) and [Amnesiac Lapp](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lapp) (if he moved to Earthen Peak Ruins)
Defeat the [Demon Prince](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Demon+Prince) to gain the [Soul of the Demon Prince](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+the+Demon+Prince)

If you had Lapp get the Titanite Slab for you, you can travel back to Earthen Peak Ruins and pick up a [Siegbräu](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Siegbr%C3%A4u) from where he was standing. Then return to The Demon Prince
Pick up the [Small Envoy Banner](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Small+Envoy+Banner) and display it at the cliff to get to The Ringed City
Once you've arrived, turn around and get a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)
After going down the stairs onto the bridge, take a right and go down the path to find the [Ruin Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ruin+Set)

Get to the halfway point on the bridge and drop down from the circular platform on the right. After dropping down to the path, turn around to find a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)

Continue on the path to find a [Crystal Lizard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Lizard) who drops [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite) + [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)
Go around the structure, climb up the ladder, and kill the judicator who drops a [Divine Blessing](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Divine+Blessing)

On the bridge itself you can find a [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior), [Titanite Chunk x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk), an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember), and [Budding Green Blossom x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Budding+Green+Blossom)
Go down the stairs below the platform where the judicator was on (on the side facing the bridge) to find a [Hidden Blessing](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hidden+Blessing) in a room
Now go down the stairs behind the judicator and follow this path to find [Purging Stone x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Purging+Stone)

After lighting the bonfire go out on the balcony and talk to [Lapp](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lapp) to get a [Siegbräu](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Siegbr%C3%A4u). Make sure to exhaust Lapp's dialogue here and then pick up an [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember) next to him

Take the only path and follow it to find a [Hollow Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hollow+Gem) on a corpse and stick to the right to find a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk) next to a railing

Follow the path and enter the circular room. Inside jump on the chandelier and onto the platform on the outer ring to find a [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite). Below you can find a [Shriving Stone](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shriving+Stone)

Exit this room using the stairs and when coming to the street turn right and head towards the door. Talk to [Shira, Knight of Filianore](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shira), making sure to answer Gwyn, and accept her request. She will give you the [Sacred Chime of Filianore](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Sacred+Chime+of+Filianore)
Turn around and drop down at the right side for a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
Now head towards the first bridge to find [Mossfruit x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Mossfruit)

Enter the small garden here to be invaded by [Seeker of the Spurned](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Seeker+of+the+Spurned). He will invade even if you are unembered and killing him rewards you with the [Wolf Ring+3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Wolf+Ring). Further in the back is the [Black Witch Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Witch+Set)
Go back on the street and in a small alcove on the left side, just before the swamp, is [Mossfruit x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Mossfruit)
Go onto the other side and through the corridor to find the [Ringed Knight Spear](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ringed+Knight+Spear)
Drop down onto the street to find a [Large Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)
As you enter the swamp, pick up the [Dark Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dark+Gem) before the collapsed tower
Take a right to find some stairs that lead to [Prism Stone x4](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Prism+Stone) and the Ringed City Streets bonfire
Exit back out of the bonfire room, drop down one level, go left, and drop down in the corner to find [White Preacher Head](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/White+Preacher+Head)

Follow the path to reemerge at the swamp entrance. This time pass the stairs and pick up the [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior) next to some rocks and a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk) to the right behind the rocks. Kill the judicator for a [Hidden Blessing](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Hidden+Blessing)
From the previous items continue sticking right and go up the hill to find the [Ringed Knight Straight Sword](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ringed+Knight+Straight+Sword)

Turn around and head back down where you pick up the [Preacher's Right Arm](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Preacher's+Right+Arm) from the collapsed tower, a [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior) from the smaller structure behind it, and another [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior) in the middle of the swamp
From there head to the back cliff and look behind the rock on the left to find a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
On the lower left side of the church is the [Black Witch Veil](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Black+Witch+Veil)
Go on the roof of the church and at the back is a [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)
Drop down in the back and open up the shortcut to the bonfire

Go out into the swamp and once you stand in it keep using [Young White Branches](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Young+White+Branch) until you transform into a [Humanity](https://darksouls.wiki.fextralife.com/Giant+Humanity). (Note: You may only walk in this form.) Now go back to the room where you opened the shortcut and there will be some writing on the wall to the left of the gate. Stand in front of it and a ladder will drop down

After going up the ladder progress through the small area and kill the judicator who drops a [Divine Blessing](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Divine+Blessing), then go down some stairs and further down a ladder. Now cross the bridge, pick up the [Large Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight) on the left, and go right to find the [Purging Monument](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Purging+Monument). Interact with it
Head back across the bridge and continue on this path to find the [Dragonhead Shield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragonhead+Shield)
Drop down from there and enter the building ahead to find the [Covetous Gold Serpent Ring+3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Covetous+Gold+Serpent+Ring)
Just to the right of it you will once again meet [Lapp](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lapp). Talk to him and make sure to speak of the Purging Monument and exhaust his dialogue

Leave the room, circle around the structure in your path, and cross a bridge to encounter a [Crystal Lizard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Lizard) who drops [Twinkling Titanite x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)

Continue on in the same direction, dropping down a ledge. When you go upstairs from there and enter the structure you will get invaded by [Silver Knight Ledo](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Silver+Knight+Ledo) who drops [Ledo's Great Hammer](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ledo's+Great+Hammer). The invasion takes place even if you are unembered
Explore the balcony on the left to find [Titanite Chunk x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
Exit where you entered and drop down the ledges to find [Havel's Ring+3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Havel's+Ring)
Below are three Monks around a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)
Turn back in the direction of the swamp entrance and pick up a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk) on the left by the collapsed tower
Keep left until you come upon a sunken dome behind which there is a [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)

Continue along the left cliff and walk up the hill to find the [White Birch Bow](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/White+Birch+Bow) and a [Titanite Chunk](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Chunk)
Go down the hill on the other side to find a white birch with three [Young White Branches](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Young+White+Branch)
Enter the structure on the right to find the [Church Guardian Shiv](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Church+Guardian+Shiv)

Continue towards the back of the swamp and defeat the [Dragonslayer Armour](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragonslayer+Armour) to get the [Iron Dragonslayer Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Iron+Dragonslayer+Set)
In the vicinity you will find a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) and another [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)
Turn around and head back into the swamp. Next to a tree is a [Soul of a Crestfallen Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Crestfallen+Knight)

Go back to the bridge behind the church (e.g., by warping to the bonfire and exiting via the shortcut) and take a right to find a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) and the [Dragonhead Greatshield](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragonhead+Greatshield)

On the cliffside where Midir attacks you, you can find [Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior), [Titanite Scale x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale) (in a small side room from which an enemy comes), [Rubbish](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Rubbish), and [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior). (You can also come back later when the dragon is gone from the bridge above and pick up these items without having to worry about the fire)
On the path below the cliff you can find [Titanite Scale x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)

You will get invaded by Moaning Knight at some point in the Shared Graves area. He invades regardless of whether you are embered or not and drops the [Blindfold Mask](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blindfold+Mask)
After dropping down enter the first grave on the left for a [Lightning Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Gem)
Continue up to find a [Simple Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Simple+Gem)
After dropping down a second time turn around and walk up the stones to enter another grave
Lapp should be in here. Interact with him to gain the Patches Squat gesture if you don't already have it and talk to him. If he is not present simply reset the zone
Turn around and go to where the purple patch of cloth is and a cutscene will play, after which you are now at a lower staircase
After dropping down once again turn around to find a [Blessed Gem](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blessed+Gem)
Continue up and in the first grave is a mimic chest. It drops the [Ring of the Evil Eye+3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ring+of+the+Evil+Eye)

After lighting the bonfire you can kill the [Crystal Lizard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Lizard), who drops [Twinkling Titanite](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite) + [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)

Go to where Lapp was before to find [Champion's Bones](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Champion's+Bones) + [Lapp's Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lapp's+Set) (the bones will only be there if you haven't already gotten them from the Ashes of Ariandel DLC)
Go outside, defeat the dragon Midir (necessary to unlock the bossfight), and on the bridge is a [Titanite Scale](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)

Enter the room and to the right of the stairs is an illusory wall. Behind it is another one with a [Large Soul of a Weary Warrior](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Large+Soul+of+a+Weary+Warrior). Behind this one is yet another illusory wall with the [Lightning Arrow](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Lightning+Arrow) miracle
Go up the stairs to find a [Crystal Lizard](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crystal+Lizard) who drops [Titanite Scale x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Scale)
In the next room take the elevator that leads you to the shortcut that connects to the Ringed Inner Wall bonfire
Take the elevator down and exit halfway. Take a right and drop down to the [Chloranthy Ring+3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Chloranthy+Ring)
Use the elevator again, but this time go left. Pick up the [Ember](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ember)
Attack the statue that isn't holding a sword to reveal an illusory wall. Behind the ladder is a [Filianore's Spear Ornament](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Filianore's+Spear+Ornament)
Take the ladder down to find the [Antiquated Plain Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Antiquated+Plain+Set)
For the following fight you can summon [Shira, Knight of Filianore](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shira), if you accepted her request to put Midir to rest

Defeat [Darkeater Midir](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Darkeater+Midir) to gain [Spears of the Church](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Spears+of+the+Church) + [Soul of Darkeater Midir](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+Darkeater+Midir)
After killing Midir go back to Shira in the Ringed City Streets and she rewards you with a [Titanite Slab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Slab)
Go back to where you picked up the Chloranthy Ring and exit towards the church

Pick up [Budding Green Blossom x3](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Budding+Green+Blossom) on the left and then defeat the [Ringed Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ringed+Knight) to get the [Ringed Knight Paired Greatswords](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ringed+Knight+Paired+Greatswords)
To the right of where the knight was is the [Ritual Spear Fragment](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ritual+Spear+Fragment)
Before entering the church, drop down on the left to find [Twinkling Titanite x2](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Twinkling+Titanite)

You can summon [Unbreakable Patches](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Unbreakable+Patches) for the next fight if you encountered him in the Shared Grave. His summon sign is inside the church, by the opened door

Defeat [Halflight, Spear of the Church](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Halflight,+Spear+of+the+Church) to gain [Titanite Slab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Slab) + [Filianore's Spear Ornament](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Filianore's+Spear+Ornament)

After entering Filianore's Rest, walk through the broken window and stick to the right to get to a church-like structure. Shira, Knight of Filianore will appear and upon defeating her will drop the [Crucifix of the Mad King](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Crucifix+of+the+Mad+King). She will also drop her [Titanite Slab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Slab) if you did not already obtain it

From where you started stick to the left now to find a [Ringed Knight](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Ringed+Knight) who rewards you with a [Titanite Slab](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Titanite+Slab)
After killing Shira go back to where you first met her to find the door now open and [Shira's Set](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Shira's+Set) inside

Go to the start of the DLC, The Dreg Heap bonfire, and interact with the corpse of the old woman to receive the [Old Woman's Ashes](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Old+Woman's+Ashes), which allow the Handmaiden to sell the Splitleaf Greatsword (if you haven't already bought it)

Defeat [Slave Knight Gael](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Slave+Knight+Gael+(Boss)) to gain [Soul of Slave Knight Gael](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Soul+of+Slave+Knight+Gael) + [Blood of the Dark Soul](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blood+of+the+Dark+Soul)
Bring the [Blood of the Dark Soul](http://darksouls3.wiki.fextralife.com/Blood+of+the+Dark+Soul) to the painter in Ariandel Chapel if you want
